<s> The heat seeking missile hit the plane s starboard wing and exploded causing the inner engine to also explode </s>
<s> A fuel tank and hydraulic lines unk creating a fire that the passengers and crew could not put out </s>
<s> The second starboard engine failed almost immediately leaving Hood with only his two port engines </s>
<s> unk wildly the unk began to descend rapidly </s>

<s> We re going in he unk </s>
<s> unk his passengers to unk for an emergency landing he aimed for an open field of cotton in the unk Hills in the bush to the west of unk intending to belly land the craft </s>

<s> The remaining fuel tanks unk and caught fire setting the wrecked cabin unk </s>

<s> unk claims responsibility but denies killing survivors unk claimed responsibility for the attack in an interview with the BBC s Today radio programme the next day laughing as he did so to the horror of most Rhodesian observers both black and white </s>
<s> He said that he had received intelligence that the unk was being used for military purposes </s>

<s> Reactions White unk turn against blacks A report published in the American magazine Time a fortnight later described the incident as a genuine horror story calculated to make the most unk of Rhodesian unk unk seem true </s>
<s> Indeed the white community in Rhodesia heard the news with unk and many turned their minds to exacting unk for what they and many others saw as an act of terrorism </s>

<s> Smith unk talks halted The talks between Smith and the unk leader that had been progressing so unk were immediately halted by Salisbury </s>

<s> Rhodesia strikes back Operation unk Rhodesia hits New unk Because unk and unk were based in Zambia many unk unk for a massive retaliatory strike against terrorist targets in that country but the first external target hit by the security forces following the Viscount unk was the prominent cluster of ZANLA bases around unk in Mozambique </s>
<s> The Rhodesian military had struck these bases extensively in November during Operation unk destroying much of the ZANLA presence there but the insurgents had since built a complex called New unk slightly to the east the new camps were distributed across a far larger area than the originals </s>

<s> unk s primary target just kilometres miles north east of central unk was the formerly white owned unk Farm which had been transformed into unk s main headquarters and training base under the name Freedom Camp </s>

<s> unk by Squadron Leader Chris Dixon who identified himself to unk Airport tower as Green Leader a Rhodesian Air Force group flew into Zambia at very low altitudes thereby avoiding unk radar and took control of the country s airspace for about a quarter of an hour during the initial assault on unk Farm informing unk tower that the attack was against Rhodesian dissidents and not against Zambia and that Rhodesian Hawker Hunters were unk the unk airfields under orders to shoot down any fighter that attempted to take off </s>

<s> Aftermath The Rhodesian attacks on ZANLA and unk bases did much to restore white morale following the Viscount incident though they had not actually made much impact on the respective guerrilla campaigns </s>
<s> unk and the unk President Kenneth unk all the same requested further military aid and better weapons from the Soviets and the British respectively </s>
<s> Martial law was quickly extended across Rhodesia s rural areas and covered three quarters of the country by the end of </s>
<s> Air Rhodesia meanwhile began developing anti unk shielding for its unk </s>

<s> This time there were no survivors </s>

<s> There were no further Viscount unk in Rhodesia </s>
<s> In the elections held the following year under the Internal Settlement terms boycotted by unk and unk unk won a majority and became the first Prime Minister of the reconstituted majority ruled state of Zimbabwe Rhodesia on June </s>
<s> This new order failed to win international acceptance however and in December the Lancaster House Agreement was agreed in London by Zimbabwe Rhodesia the UK government and the Patriotic Front returning the country to its former colonial status </s>
<s> The UK government suspended the constitution and took direct control for an interim period </s>
<s> Fresh elections were won by unk who took power in April concurrently with the country s recognised independence as Zimbabwe </s>
<s> Legacy and memorial In modern Zimbabwe it is not the Viscount unk but rather the unk Rhodesian strikes against nationalist guerrilla camps that endure predominantly in the cultural memory </s>
<s> State media in Zimbabwe prominently the Herald newspaper often claim that Rhodesian forces unk and deliberately unk thousands of helpless refugees during such operations </s>
<s> unk s unk of civilian planes is meanwhile portrayed as a legitimate act of war on the grounds that the guerrillas might have believed them to have military personnel or equipment on board </s>
<s> The massacre of surviving Flight unk passengers at the crash site is often omitted or attributed to forces other than unk in his memoirs unk repeated his claim that unk fighters had helped the survivors and wrote simply that I truly have no idea how the ten died </s>
<s> A monument to those killed in the Rhodesian attack on unk was built in Zambia in and dedicated jointly by the unk and unk governments </s>
<s> A memorial to the victims of the two Rhodesian Viscount incidents dubbed the Viscount Memorial was erected on the grounds of the unk Monument in unk South Africa in and inaugurated on September that year </s>
<s> The names of the dead passengers and crew are engraved on two granite slabs that stand upright side by side the pair topped by an emblem symbolising an aircraft </s>
<s> A pole beside the monument flies the Rhodesian flag </s>
<s> A British parliamentary motion put forward by Labour MP Kate unk in February to unk unk the Viscount attacks and unk the victims on the anniversary of the second unk prompted unk in the unk press with the Herald branding it a racist unk motion intended to unk the unk administration and its supporters </s>
<s> unk unk a former unk commander described the move as a unk motivated by race that went against the spirit of the amnesty enacted at Lancaster House </s>

<s> Newspaper and journal articles unk unk unk unk al in modern unk unk is the ruins of an ancient city found in a unk in Guatemala </s>
<s> unk unk a gum unk reported the ruins to La unk a unk newspaper which named the site unk </s>
<s> After the Berlin Academy of Sciences magazine republished the report in unk and treasure hunters began visiting the forest </s>
<s> Today tourism to the site may help protect the unk </s>
<s> It is one of the largest archaeological sites and urban centers of the pre Columbian Maya civilization </s>
<s> It is located in the archaeological region of the unk Basin in what is now northern Guatemala </s>
<s> Situated in the department of El unk the site is part of Guatemala s unk National Park and in it was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site </s>
<s> unk was the capital of a conquest state that became one of the most powerful kingdoms of the ancient Maya </s>
<s> Though monumental architecture at the site dates back as far as the century BC unk reached its unk during the Classic Period c to AD </s>
<s> During this time the city dominated much of the Maya region politically economically and militarily while interacting with areas throughout unk such as the great metropolis of unk in the distant Valley of Mexico </s>
<s> There is evidence that unk was conquered by unk in the century AD </s>
<s> Following the end of the Late Classic Period no new major monuments were built at unk and there is evidence that elite palaces were burned </s>
<s> These events were coupled with a gradual population decline culminating with the site s abandonment by the end of the century </s>
<s> unk is the best understood of any of the large lowland Maya cities with a long dynastic ruler list the discovery of the tombs of many of the rulers on this list and the investigation of their monuments temples and palaces </s>
<s> Etymology The name unk may be derived from unk unk unk in the unk Maya language it is said to be a relatively modern name meaning at the unk </s>
<s> The name was apparently applied to one of the site s ancient reservoirs by hunters and travelers in the region </s>
<s> It has alternatively been interpreted as meaning the place of the voices in the unk Maya language </s>
<s> unk however is not the ancient name for the site but rather the name adopted shortly after its discovery in the </s>

<s> Tropical Storm unk Tropical Storm unk was the tenth tropical storm of the Atlantic hurricane season </s>
<s> unk developed out of a strong tropical wave which moved off the African coast on August </s>
<s> The wave quickly became organized and was declared Tropical Depression Ten while located mi km to the south southeast of the Cape Verde Islands on September </s>
<s> The depression was quickly upgraded to Tropical Storm unk around noon the same day </s>
<s> Over the next several days unk moved in a general west northwest direction and reached its peak intensity early on September </s>
<s> Strong wind shear some due to the outflow of Hurricane Ike and dry air caused the storm to weaken </s>
<s> On September the combination of wind shear dry air and cooling waters caused unk to weaken into a tropical depression </s>
<s> unk deteriorated into a remnant low shortly after as convection continued to dissipate around the storm </s>
<s> The low ultimately dissipated while located mi km east of unk on September </s>
<s> However the remnant moisture led to minor flooding on the island of St Croix </s>
<s> Meteorological history Tropical Storm unk formed as a tropical wave that emerged off the west coast of Africa near the end of August </s>
<s> It tracked south of Cape Verde and slowly developed and on September the disturbance became Tropical Depression Ten while located south southeast of the Cape Verde islands </s>
<s> As the depression became more organized an eye like feature developed in the upper levels of the system </s>
<s> The depression was upgraded to Tropical Storm unk six hours after forming </s>
<s> unk was located in an area which was supportive for rapid intensification but was not forecast to intensify quickly </s>
<s> unk continued to intensify throughout the afternoon as the storm became more symmetrical </s>
<s> However due to the location of the storm there was a lack of accurate wind speed readings and the National Hurricane Center was uncertain of its actual intensity </s>
<s> Despite the lack of wind shear around the storm the center became slightly exposed and ceased further intensification </s>
<s> The storm was also heading into an area where shear was unk to significantly increase due to an upper level trough diving southward </s>
<s> Despite convection being partially removed from the center of unk the storm intensified slightly in the early morning hours on September as thunderstorm activity to the south of the center became more organized </s>
<s> The intensification was forecast to be short in duration as the trough to the north was deepening causing the wind shear to the west to become stronger </s>
<s> unk reached its peak intensity of mph km h around am unk as it continued to become more organized </s>
<s> However there were indications that it had already begun to weaken </s>
<s> unk towards the north was becoming restricted and arc clouds began emanating from the storm a sign that dry air was entering the system </s>
<s> During the afternoon hours the structure of unk began to rapidly deteriorate as strong wind shear and dry air took their toll </s>
<s> By the late night the center was almost completely exposed and only a band of convection persisted near the center </s>
<s> Despite continuing effects from the strong wind shear a large deep burst of convection formed in the northern unk of unk </s>
<s> The center was found to have shifted towards the new convection leading to an increase in intensity </s>
<s> The forecast showed a slight decrease in wind shear as unk continued westward and no change in intensity over the day forecast was predicted </s>
<s> However the convection decreased once more and the low became completely exposed by the late morning hours and unk weakened again </s>
<s> By the afternoon the center of unk was only a unk of clouds devoid of convection </s>
<s> During the overnight hours on September into the morning of September convection associated with unk began to unk somewhat mostly to the north of the circulation due to the strong unk wind shear </s>
<s> By mid morning unk re intensified slightly due to the redevelopment of some convection </s>
<s> However the redevelopment was short lived and wind shear again took its toll on unk by late morning </s>
<s> The convection around the system became unk from the center and unk weakened slightly </s>
<s> The weakening trend continued through the afternoon as the storm was being affected by strong unk shear </s>
<s> unk became almost fully devoid of any convection by mid afternoon and the storm weakened to mph km h barely holding on to tropical storm status </s>
<s> unk regained a small amount of convection in the late night hours but not enough to still be classified a tropical storm </s>
<s> Due to the lack of convection unk was downgraded to a Tropical Depression at unk unk with winds of mph km h </s>
<s> Since there was no convection around the system it would have normally been classified a remnant low but due to the possibility of the storm unk over the next several days it was considered a tropical depression </s>
<s> The next morning unk was downgraded to a remnant low as strong wind shear and dry air caused the demise of the storm </s>
<s> No redevelopment was expected with unk as it began to move over colder waters and remain under strong wind shear until it dissipated </s>
<s> However the remnant low associated with unk began to show signs of redevelopment during the afternoon on September </s>
<s> unk around the system increased significantly and the low was no longer exposed </s>
<s> On September wind shear took over the system again </s>
<s> unk around the remnant low was torn away and the low was exposed once more </s>
<s> The National Hurricane Center did not state the chance of regeneration once the low became exposed </s>
<s> Finally on September wind shear and dry air led to the remnants of unk deteriorating into an open wave </s>
<s> However on September the remnants of unk redeveloped and global models picked up on the reformed system </s>
<s> Once more the chance of regeneration was possible as the remnants of unk headed towards the Bahamas </s>
<s> However on September dry air and wind shear caused the remnants to dissipate entirely </s>
<s> Impact As unk passed to the south of the Cape Verde islands on September outer rain bands produced minor rainfall totaling around </s>
<s> inches mm </s>
<s> There were no reports of damage or flooding from the rain and overall effects were minor </s>

<s> mm of rain fell </s>

<s> Mount unk Mount unk is the highest summit of the Rocky Mountains of North America and the highest point in the US state of Colorado and the entire Mississippi River drainage basin </s>
<s> The ultra prominent foot unk </s>
<s> m unk is the highest peak in the unk Range and the second highest summit in the contiguous United States after Mount Whitney </s>
<s> Mount unk is located in San Isabel National Forest </s>
<s> miles </s>
<s> km southwest bearing of the City of unk in Lake County Colorado </s>
<s> The mountain was named in honor of Colorado statesman Samuel unk unk who was active in the formative period of the state and Governor of the Territory of Colorado from to </s>
<s> Henry W unk of the unk Survey was the first to record an ascent of the peak in </s>
<s> The unk and most popular climbing routes are categorized as Class to or A in unk unk </s>
<s> Mount unk is therefore often referred to as the gentle giant that tops all others in the Rocky Mountains </s>
<s> Geography Mount unk is visible to the southwest of unk often snow capped even in the summer </s>
<s> Many other unk surround unk in all directions and it is very close to central Colorado s Collegiate unk </s>
<s> The neighboring Mount Massive to the north is the second highest peak in the Rocky Mountains and the third highest in the contiguous United States and La Plata Peak to the south is the fifth highest in the Rockies </s>
<s> The community of Twin Lakes lies at the base of Mount unk Denver is about miles unk km to the east unk is miles km to the north and unk is miles km to the west </s>
<s> unk about miles km to the northeast is the nearest large town </s>
<s> unk s parent peak is Mount Whitney in California </s>
<s> Including Alaska and Hawaii Mount unk is the fourteenth highest mountain in the United States </s>
<s> Weather conditions often change rapidly and afternoon thunderstorms are common in the unk unk and snow are possible year round </s>
<s> An electrical storm on the mountain s summit was considered remarkable enough to be reported in the July issue of Science </s>
<s> Geology Mount unk is part of the unk Range an unk of the Laramide unk which separated from the Mosquito Range to the east around million years ago </s>
<s> The tops of this range were heavily unk leaving behind characteristic summit features and other such clues </s>
<s> For example the base of unk on the eastern side exhibits large igneous and unk rocks deposited when the glaciers unk which lie on a lateral unk </s>
<s> Further up the eastern side there is a large unk with a small unk </s>
<s> There are also lakes to both the north and south unk and Twin Lakes respectively the Twin Lakes are a result of the natural dam of end moraines and unk Lake was created by the unk Sugar unk Dam </s>
<s> Mount unk is composed largely of unk </s>
<s> However the summit ridge consists of unk basement rock which is Pre unk in origin and about </s>
<s> billion years old </s>
<s> There are various igneous unk including unk as well as bands of unk and unk </s>
<s> Unlike mountains of similar altitude elsewhere unk lacks both a permanent unk and a prominent north facing unk which can be attributed to its position amongst other mountains of similar height causing it to receive relatively small quantities of precipitation </s>
<s> History Mount unk was named by miners in honor of Samuel unk unk the governor of the then Territory of Colorado because he brokered a treaty in September with the unk tribe that opened up more than acres of reservation land to mining and railroad activity </s>
<s> The first recorded ascent of the peak was by unk unk in who was surveying the mountain as part of the unk Survey </s>
<s> Originally measured as unk feet unk m in height Mount unk s elevation was later adjusted to feet m following a re evaluation of mapped elevations which sparked protests </s>
<s> The actual change was made in as a result of the North American unk unk of it seems the original measurement resulted from the Sea Level unk of </s>
<s> A matter of some contention arose after the Great Depression over the heights of unk and its neighbor Mount Massive which differ in elevation by only feet </s>
<s> m </s>
<s> This led to an ongoing dispute that came to a head with the Mount Massive supporters building large piles of stones on the summit to boost its height only to have the Mount unk proponents unk them </s>
<s> The effort was ultimately unsuccessful and Mount unk has remained the highest peak in Colorado </s>
<s> The first unk ascent of unk occurred in when a Jeep was driven to the summit apparently to judge suitability for skiing development </s>

<s> km long North Main unk Trail begins close to the unk Creek unk and gains about feet m </s>
<s> The trail is open to unk mountain unk and hunters during season </s>
<s> An easier but longer route the South unk Trail is </s>
<s> miles </s>
<s> km long climbing feet m at a less punishing gradient than the North unk Trail approaching from the south and then climbing the eastern ridge </s>
<s> The most difficult of the main routes is the Black Cloud Trail a Class climb that takes ten to fourteen hours depending on pace gains feet m in elevation and also involves an ascent of the sub peak South unk at feet m </s>
<s> Even healthy and experienced unk report great difficulty on this route and despite the fact that there is a trail the route is extremely steep unstable and rocky in places </s>
<s> The elevation gain is not evenly distributed over the </s>
<s> mile ascent </s>
<s> There are also routes approaching from the western face and southwestern ridge from South unk Creek unk and Echo Canyon unk respectively </s>
<s> Although strenuous and requiring physical fitness none of the conventional routes require specialist unk skills or technical rock climbing </s>
<s> The main dangers of the mountain are those common to all high mountains particularly altitude sickness </s>
<s> This can affect anyone even those who are unk </s>
<s> In serious cases it can lead to high altitude pulmonary unk and unk unk which can lead to difficulties with breathing unk and death </s>
<s> unk are advised to begin their ascent at or before am and to summit and descend before early afternoon to minimize exposure to possible afternoon thunderstorms while at high altitudes </s>
<s> Although the most conventional form of ascent is by hiking Anna Elizabeth Dickinson the unk ascended the mountain on a mule borrowed from the US government </s>
<s> Scientology in Germany The Church of Scientology has been present in Germany since </s>
<s> German authorities estimate that there are active Scientologists in Germany today the Church of Scientology gives a membership figure of around </s>
<s> The Church of Scientology has encountered particular unk from the German press and government and occupies a precarious legal social and cultural position in Germany </s>
<s> German courts have so far not resolved whether Scientology should be accorded the legal status of a religious or unk community and different courts have reached contradictory conclusions </s>
<s> The German domestic intelligence service has monitored the organization s activities </s>
<s> The German government does not recognize Scientology as a religion </s>
<s> It views it as an abusive business unk as a religion and believes that it pursues political goals that conflict with the values enshrined in the German constitution </s>
<s> This stance has been criticized most notably by the US government which recognizes Scientology as a religion and has raised concerns about the violation of individual rights posed by sect unk </s>
<s> Scientologists in Germany face specific political and economic restrictions </s>
<s> They are barred from membership in some major political parties and businesses and other employers use so called sect unk to expose a prospective business partner s or employee s association with the organization </s>
<s> German federal and state interior ministers started a process aimed at banning Scientology in late but abandoned the initiative a year later finding insufficient legal grounds </s>
<s> Despite this polls suggest that most Germans favor banning Scientology altogether </s>
<s> Background Scientology founded in the early in the United States by L Ron Hubbard and today claiming to be represented in countries has been a very controversial new religious movement </s>
<s> Its stated unk aim is to clear the planet to bring about an enlightened age in which every individual has overcome their psychological limitations </s>
<s> Scientology teaches that the source of people s unk lies in unk psychological unk acquired in the course of painful experiences which can be cleared through a type of unk called unk made available by the Church of Scientology </s>
<s> The fact that Scientologists have to pay large fees for unk and other Scientology services has brought controversy to Scientology throughout much of its history with governments unk it as a profit making enterprise rather than as a religion </s>
<s> Critics maintain that Scientology is a business driven unk unk totalitarian ideology with world dominating aspirations and that it tricks its members into parting with significant sums of money for Scientology courses </s>
<s> Scientology has fought unk lawsuits to defend itself against such charges and to pursue legal recognition as a religion </s>
<s> These efforts have been partly successful Scientology has gained recognition as a tax exempt religious group in a number of countries most notably in Australia in and the United States in and in won an important case at the European Court of Human Rights which unk Russia for failing to register Scientology as a religion </s>
<s> The German government has said that it does not consider Scientology a religion but a commercial enterprise with a history of taking advantage of vulnerable individuals and an extreme dislike of any criticism whose totalitarian structure and methods may pose a risk to Germany s democratic society </s>
<s> Accordingly the German government has taken a very strong stance against the organization </s>
<s> Germany is not alone in opposing Scientology in France the Church of Scientology was convicted of organized fraud in October after a court found that members had been manipulated into paying large sums for Scientology products and the Church only narrowly escaped being banned altogether </s>
<s> Scientology is similarly controversial in Belgium Greece and the UK </s>
<s> On the subject of Scientology s status as a religion the German government has pointed to a decision by the Federal Labor Court of Germany </s>
<s> That court noting Hubbard s instruction that Scientologists should make money make more money make other people produce so as to make more money came to the conclusion that Scientology unk to be a church merely as a cover to pursue its economic interests </s>
<s> In the same decision the court also found that Scientology uses unk and totalitarian practices </s>
<s> Given the lessons of Germany s century history in which the country came to be dominated by a fascist movement that started from similarly small beginnings Germany is very wary of any ideological movement that might appear to be seeking a position of absolute power </s>
<s> unk in Scientology writings to the elimination of parasites and unk people who stand in the way of progress towards Scientology s unk world without unk without criminals and without war evoke uncomfortable parallels with Nazism and have led to Scientology being classified as an unk political movement </s>
<s> To further justify its stance the German government has also pointed to the long history of US court cases involving Scientology including the conviction of top Scientologists in and for a conspiracy involving the infiltration of US government agencies unk and the theft of government documents a US Supreme Court finding that Scientology practices took place in a unk environment and Scientology s track record of pursuing its critics through malicious court cases and private investigators </s>
<s> In examining the potential threat posed by Scientology the German government has noted that Scientology organizations are structured so as to make the individual unk and financially dependent on a Scientology system and that members often abandon contact with friends and family </s>
<s> History Scientology presence in Germany Scientology first became active in Germany in </s>
<s> By there were ten major centres Scientology Churches as well as fourteen minor centres Scientology unk in Germany </s>
<s> The German Scientology Churches are located in the big cities Munich Hamburg Berlin Düsseldorf Frankfurt am Main Hanover and unk </s>
<s> Of the Scientology unk nine are in Baden unk and three in unk </s>
<s> Following German re unification Scientology proved unable to gain significant numbers of followers in the territories of the former German Democratic Republic most adherents are found in Baden unk unk and North Rhine unk </s>
<s> Scientology is represented by a large number of independent associations or unk in Germany their umbrella organisation is the Scientology unk unk unk Germany s domestic intelligence service the unk für unk unk or Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution estimates that there are Scientologists in Germany down from earlier estimates of to </s>
<s> The Church of Scientology reported around members from the mid onwards this number remained stable for many years </s>
<s> However more recently Scientology has said it has only members </s>
<s> unk in Scientology membership numbers arise because the Church of Scientology applies more inclusive criteria in establishing its figures essentially including anyone who has purchased a book or participated in courses regardless of their subsequent involvement </s>
<s> The number of unk bound Scientology staff members working in German Scientology organizations is unlikely to exceed a few hundred </s>
<s> Scientology formulated a unk Germany strategy in similar to equivalent strategies pursued by Scientology in other countries and regions of the world with the long term aim of transforming German society in line with the unk ideal a non unk society in which Scientology enjoys unk influence </s>
<s> The programme sought to address Scientology s image problems in Germany to identify weak points in Germany that could be exploited for political gain such as Germany s National Socialist history and to increase both membership figures and political influence in German society with a special emphasis on unk Scientologists into key positions in industry and government </s>
<s> As most religions seek to widen their influence in society such a programme could of course also be defended as a missionary effort much like those many religions engage in </s>
<s> However according to the unk the strategy has not had any significant success </s>
<s> By government officials had been suspected of being Scientologists and in cases the suspicions were confirmed but apart from some isolated cases most of the officials concerned had not used their positions to advertise Scientology </s>
<s> According to unk unk it is unknown to what degree the unk Germany programme is still being pursued </s>
<s> Public opposition German public discourse does not regard Scientology as a religion but generally unk it as a unk cult or sect or as an unk profit making venture preying on vulnerable minds </s>
<s> Public concerns about the potential dangers posed by cults date back to the early when widespread debate took place about youth religions such as the unk Church unk Children of God and the Divine Light Mission </s>
<s> The most prominent critics of these new religious movements were the sect commissioners unk of Germany s Protestant Churches who also actively promoted the establishment of private initiatives of parents and concerned persons </s>
<s> unk unk Educational Information Campaign became an important organization dedicated to opposing Scientology taking an activist stance it warned people not to get involved with Scientology filed successful lawsuits against the Church of Scientology over its unk in public places and published an influential book The unk of Scientology and its Front unk </s>
<s> In the organization s founder unk unk became the director of unk für unk und unk unk Campaign for unk and unk Freedom Germany s most prominent anti cult organization </s>
<s> unk from sect experts about the influence of new religious movements gained media attention which put political pressure on the government to deal with the situation as the movements were not doing anything illegal the government resorted to issuing a range of leaflets and public statements giving general warnings about religious unk the earliest of these publications appearing in </s>
<s> unk by events such as the unk Siege in the murders and suicides associated with the Order of the Solar Temple and the unk unk incidents in Japan German fears and concerns about new religious movements gained in intensity in the with Scientology attracting particular attention </s>
<s> unk that Scientology had a totalitarian character were reinforced when Robert unk Young an American ex Scientologist and former PR official in the Church of Scientology visited German officials in late and wrote an article in Der unk a widely read weekly magazine describing Scientology as a totalitarian system operating a unk the unk Project Force for members of Scientology s Sea Org found guilty of unk </s>
<s> From the mid onward press articles reports and essays on Scientology appeared on an almost daily basis accompanied by books and television programmes that reached a mass audience </s>
<s> As noted by the religious scholar Hubert unk Scientology came to be seen as a serious political danger that not only threatened to turn individuals into will less zombies but was also conspiring to overthrow the democratic constitution of the state </s>
<s> This view of Scientology as a public enemy unk adds became a matter of political unk senior political figures became involved in launching campaigns against Scientology and being suspected of any association with it resulted in social unk </s>
<s> Stephen A Kent writing in noted that officials at all levels of German government shared the insistence that Scientology should be suppressed </s>

<s> Officials examining primary and secondary sources legal documents and the testimony of former members concluded that the organization was unk to a democratic state </s>

<s> Government publications on the dangers of unk increased between and and a significant number of them dealt with the Church of Scientology </s>
<s> The German courts had approved such publications in seeing them as part of the government s responsibility to keep the public informed and finding that they did not interfere with religious freedom </s>
<s> In the German parliament launched an unk unk Commission to investigate unk and similar groups in large part because of public concerns about Scientology </s>
<s> Its final report published in June concluded that Scientology alone among new religious movements required monitoring by Germany s domestic intelligence services </s>
<s> An area of widespread concern in the German media has been the alleged infiltration of businesses by Scientologists in line with Scientology s declared aim to penetrate society politics and business in preparation for world domination </s>
<s> Attempts to infiltrate businesses have reportedly been most successful among small and medium size companies such as estate agents management consultants and management training companies </s>
<s> Management consultancy firms led by Scientologists often conceal their association with Scientology once they have recruited members of their clients upper management these managers may send employees to Scientology trainers as part of company education and training programmes without informing them as to the origin of the training methods used </s>
<s> An expensive commercial version of Scientology s Oxford unk Analysis usually offered free as part of Scientology unk in public places temporarily entered some major German companies who were unaware of its unk via such a management consultancy firm </s>

<s> These concerns arose because customers of around after school unk centres operated by Scientologists in Frankfurt Hamburg unk and elsewhere might be unaware that their children were being taught by Scientologists using Scientology methods </s>
<s> unk advertising the unk services would at most mention the name of L Ron Hubbard the founder of Scientology but not Scientology itself </s>
<s> In early Thomas unk unk Commissioner of the German Lutheran Church in Berlin and unk and the historian unk Knopp both likened the Scientologist Hollywood actor Tom Cruise to Goebbels the Nazi propaganda minister </s>

<s> unk s and Knopp s comments found few critics in Germany </s>
<s> Most Germans consider Scientology a unk organization </s>
<s> In Time reported that of Germans favoured banning Scientology a poll conducted in September by Der unk found support for a ban </s>
<s> German scholars such as unk unk and Gerald unk have commented that rhetoric dominates public discourse around Scientology in Germany in their view efforts to frame information in such a way as to shape opinion have long been more important than the underlying unk </s>
<s> In unk s words this includes both the efforts of German politicians to enhance their popularity with strong unk statements and Scientology s efforts to present itself as the victim of unjust persecution commenting on foreign reporting on Scientology in Germany she adds that the American press may prefer unk news to boring investigation and may frame the issue according to American stereotypes </s>
<s> Both unk and unk assert that the situation is compounded by the general unk of scientific studies of Scientology </s>

<s> Legal status While there have been calls for Scientology to be banned the Church of Scientology remains legal in Germany and is allowed to operate there </s>
<s> Its precise legal status however is unresolved </s>
<s> Two points are contested first whether or not the teachings of Scientology qualify as a religion or unk Religion or unk these are equal before German law and unk whether or not these teachings are only used as a pretext for purely commercial activity if the latter were the case this would most likely imply that Scientology would not qualify for protection as a religious or unk community unk oder unk under Article of the German constitution which guarantees the freedom of belief religion and unk </s>
<s> Status as a religious or unk community also affects a broad range of other issues in Germany such as taxation and freedom of association </s>
<s> The Federal Court of Justice of Germany has not yet made an explicit decision on the matter but implicitly assumed in that Scientology represented a religious or unk community </s>
<s> The Upper Administrative Court in Hamburg explicitly asserted in that Scientology should be viewed as a unk community </s>
<s> In the Federal Labor Court of Germany decided that the Church of Scientology merely pursued commercial aims and did not represent a religious or unk community entitled to protection under Article of the German Constitution although another decision by the same court left the question open again in </s>
<s> In another decision the Administrative Court of Baden unk in unk said there were no indications that the teachings of Scientology merely served as a pretext for commercial activity </s>
<s> In the Federal Administrative Court of Germany explicitly granted a Scientologist protection under Article </s>
<s> of the German Constitution which declares the freedom of religion and unk unk </s>
<s> Many courts have declined to assess the religious status of Scientology finding that the question was irrelevant to deciding the case at hand </s>
<s> The Federal Administrative Court for example ruled in that the question whether or not Scientology was a religion was irrelevant and that its legal status should be judged by its business activities </s>
<s> The German government does not consider the Church of Scientology to be a religious or unk community and asserts that Scientology is a profit making enterprise rather than a religion </s>
<s> Recent years have seen a number of court decisions in Scientology s favour despite the very widespread negative attitude to Scientology among politicians and the general public </s>
<s> Government surveillance Given the history of Nazism s rise to power in Germany in the the present German state has committed itself to taking active steps to prevent the rise of any ideology that threatens the values enshrined in the German constitution </s>
<s> The unk domestic intelligence service unk für unk or Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution regards the aims of Scientology as running counter to Germany s free and democratic order and has been monitoring Scientology since as have the unk for the Protection of the Constitution in a number of German unk </s>
<s> Minister for Family Policy unk unk instituted the surveillance saying that the church had totalitarian tendencies and that she would oppose Scientology with all the means at her disposal </s>
<s> The German Church of Scientology has repeatedly challenged the legality of this surveillance in court </s>
<s> In December the Administrative Court in Berlin ruled against the Berlin Office for the Protection of the Constitution and ordered it to stop the recruitment and deployment of staff and members of the Church of Scientology Berlin as paid unk </s>
<s> The court ruled that the use of unk was unk </s>
<s> In the same court ruled that it was illegal for the Berlin Office for the Protection of the Constitution to include the activities of Scientology in its report given that the report did not document any activities that were opposed to the constitution </s>
<s> At the federal level Scientology lost a complaint against continued surveillance by the unk in November </s>
<s> The federal court based its opinion on its judgment that the aims of Scientology as outlined by L Ron Hubbard in his writings were incompatible with the German constitution </s>
<s> unk acting for the Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution pointed out that Hubbard had written that civil rights for example should be restricted to Scientologists and they asserted that the Scientology organization was taking systematic steps to infiltrate society and government institutions in order to prevent anti Scientology legislation </s>
<s> unk counsel acting for the Church of Scientology had contended that Scientology was non political its aims were the liberation of the human being and that Hubbard s instructions were valid only within the Church of Scientology and were subject to interpretation and at any rate there was no effort to implement these instructions in Germany </s>
<s> The court disagreed and ruled that many sources some of them not accessible to the general public indicated that the aims of the Church of Scientology did include the unk of the principle of equality and other essential human rights </s>
<s> In unk surveillance was stopped by a court as inappropriate in because there is no local branch of Scientology and few members </s>
<s> As of May the Church of Scientology in Germany dropped the legal battle to prevent surveillance of its activities by the unk after the North Rhine unk Higher Administrative Court in unk refused to hear an appeal on the matter </s>
<s> Being suspected of maintaining ambitions against the free democratic basic order the Scientology organization added a declaration on human rights and democracy to its unk </s>
<s> There is at least one example of surveillance of Scientology by the German intelligence services outside of Germany </s>
<s> In the Swiss government detained an agent of the German government charging him with carrying out illegal business for a foreign state working for a political information service and unk identity documents </s>
<s> The German government posted bail for the agent </s>
<s> He was eventually given a day suspended jail sentence for unk on Scientology and the German government apologized to Switzerland for the incident </s>
<s> unk unk A sect filter also known as a protective declaration unk is a document that requires prospective business partners or employees to acknowledge any association with a sect or new religious movement before entering a business or employment contract </s>
<s> Such sect unk primarily used to screen out Scientologists have been drafted by German government agencies for use by businesses </s>
<s> unk commissioner s offices exist in Germany as part of regional or local government </s>
<s> A work instruction introduced in requires government staff in the unk local employment agencies and social security offices operated by the Federal Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs to mark companies owned by Scientologists with the letter S </s>
<s> Where companies are suspected of having Scientologist staff prospective employees are alerted to this fact by government staff </s>
<s> Government officials have publicised the names of individual Scientologists and conducted media campaigns against their businesses some unk have placed advertisements in the press saying they are not Scientologists in order to avoid the associated stigma </s>
<s> Due to concerns about possible government infiltration by Scientologists applicants for civil service positions in unk are required to declare whether or not they are Scientologists and a similar policy has been instituted in unk </s>
<s> Companies unk for government contracts were likewise required to state they are not Scientologists in this requirement was changed and firms are now asked to sign a form stating that the technology of L Ron Hubbard will not be used in executing the contract </s>
<s> When it became known that Microsoft s Windows operating system included a disk unk developed by Executive Software International a company headed by a Scientologist this caused concern among German government officials and clergy over data security and the potential for espionage </s>
<s> To unk these concerns Microsoft Germany agreed to provide a means to unk the utility </s>
<s> Following letters of complaint about discrimination from Scientology lawyers some American companies such as General Electric IBM and Ford Motor Company instructed their German unk to cease the use of protective declarations </s>
<s> The city state of Hamburg set up a full time office dedicated to opposing Scientology the Scientology Task Force for the Hamburg Interior Authority under the leadership of unk unk </s>
<s> In in a case brought by a Scientologist the Federal Administrative Court of Germany ordered the city of Hamburg to cease recommending the use of protective declarations to its business community finding that the practice unk religious freedom </s>
<s> In June the Hamburg Administrative Court fined the city of Hamburg unk for not unk with court instructions banning the use of sect unk </s>
<s> Internet links to sample unk to be used by businesses had continued to remain available </s>
<s> unk Barker a professor of sociology at the London School of Economics has noted that Germany has gone further than any other Western European country in unk the civil rights of Scientologists </s>
<s> The Hamburg task force was closed down in August as a result of budget cuts unk moved to a position within the Hamburg interior authority where she continues her work on Scientology </s>
<s> Scientologists have been banned from joining major political parties in Germany such as the Christian Democratic Union the Christian Social Union of unk the Social Democratic Party of Germany and the Free Democratic Party </s>
<s> unk Scientologist members of these parties have been purged according to Time Magazine </s>
<s> Scientologists have been prevented from running employment and au pair agencies in Germany Scientologists who were running such agencies had their permits revoked </s>
<s> In a sports scientist and former member of the German national fencing team was dismissed from his job at the German Olympic fencing centre after he stated in an interview that he had enjoyed reading books by L Ron Hubbard and had participated in a course run by a Scientologist management and communication consultancy firm </s>
<s> Thomas unk a German TV presenter was falsely accused in of having taken part in Scientology courses unk responded by announcing that he had not and that he would unk cease all contact with a friend who had links to Scientology </s>
<s> In Günther unk the Minister President of the German state of Baden unk expressed concern that Scientologist John unk was to appear on unk s programme and asked the unk TV station to consider unk the invitation the unk said that unk unk would cause greater damage and that Scientology was not going to be discussed in the programme </s>
<s> In the Bavarian Administrative Court ruled that a woman working in a children s unk centre whose employment had been terminated when her ex husband identified her as a Scientologist should be reinstated </s>
<s> The woman had demonstrated to the court s satisfaction that her unk beliefs were irrelevant to her work </s>
<s> According to the agreement that concluded the case she promised not to use Scientology methods in her work and to inform the children s parents of her membership in Scientology </s>
<s> Initiative to ban Scientology In March it was reported that German authorities were increasing their efforts to monitor Scientology in response to the opening of a new Scientology headquarters in Berlin </s>
<s> On December German federal and state interior ministers expressed the opinion that the Scientology organization was continuing to pursue anti constitutional goals unk essential basic and human rights like the dignity of man or the right to equal treatment and asked Germany s domestic intelligence agencies to collect and evaluate the information required for a possible judicial inquiry aimed at banning the organization </s>
<s> The move was criticized by German politicians from all sides of the political spectrum with legal experts and intelligence agencies expressing concern that an attempt to ban the organization would likely fail in the courts </s>
<s> Sabine Weber president of the Church of Scientology in Berlin called the accusations unrealistic and absurd and said that the German interior ministers evaluation was based on a few sentences out of pages of unk literature </s>
<s> She added I can also find hundreds of quotes in the Bible that are totalitarian but that doesn t mean I will demand the ban of Christianity </s>
<s> In November the government abandoned its attempts to ban Scientology after finding insufficient evidence of illegal or unconstitutional activity </s>
<s> The report by the unk cited knowledge gaps and noted several points that would make the success of any legal undertaking to ban Scientology doubtful </s>
<s> First the unk report stated there was no evidence that Scientology could be viewed as a foreign organization there were German churches and missions a German board German unk and no evidence that the organization was totally remote controlled from the United States </s>
<s> A foreign organization would have been much easier to ban than a German one </s>
<s> The second argument on which those proposing the ban had counted was Scientology s aggressive opposition to the constitution </s>
<s> Here the report found that Scientology s behaviour gave no grounds to assume that Scientology aggressively sought to attack and overthrow Germany s free and democratic basic order </s>
<s> Neither its unk nor any other utterances supported the conclusion that the organization had criminal aims </s>
<s> The unk also considered whether there were grounds to act against the Church of Scientology on the basis that they were unk medicine without a licence but expressed doubts that a court would accept this reasoning </s>
<s> Commenting on the decision to drop the ban attempt unk unk Berlin s interior minister said This organization pursues goals through its writings its concept and its disrespect for minorities that we cannot tolerate and that we consider in violation of the constitution </s>
<s> But they put very little of this into practice </s>
<s> The appraisal of the Government at the moment is that Scientology is a unk organization but it is not an organization that we have to take a hammer to </s>
<s> The Church of Scientology expressed satisfaction with the decision describing it as the only one possible </s>
<s> unk of Scientology s activities by the German intelligence services continues </s>
<s> In February the Berlin Administrative Court ruled that a poster placed by local city authorities on an advertising column next to a bus stop in front of the Berlin Scientology headquarters warning unk by of the potential dangers Scientology activities posed to democracy and individual freedom should be removed </s>
<s> The decision was upheld in July by the Upper Administrative Court of Berlin unk which ruled that the poster violated Scientologists basic religious rights </s>
<s> Criticism of Germany s stance The United States media while generally reporting negatively on Scientology in domestic news has taken an at least partially supportive stance towards Scientology in relation to Germany </s>
<s> Richard Cohen for example writing in the Washington Post said in Scientology might be one weird religion but the German reaction to it is unk still not to mention disturbing </s>
<s> Alan Cowell writing in the New York Times wrote in that the German response to Scientology motivated by officials fear that Scientology was a totalitarian movement growing like the Nazi party from unk beginnings was itself unk of the Nazi era s unk </s>
<s> The US Department of State has repeatedly claimed that Germany s actions constitute government and societal discrimination against minority religious groups and expressed its concerns over the violation of Scientologists individual rights posed by sect unk </s>
<s> The US Department of State began to include the issue of Scientology in Germany in its annual human rights reports after the agreement between the Church of Scientology and the US Internal Revenue Service through which Scientology gained the status of a tax exempt religion in the United States </s>
<s> That decision also marked the beginning of more intense lobbying efforts by the Church of Scientology in Washington using paid unk </s>
<s> The State Department s human rights report on Germany released in January warned that artists and businesses with Scientology connections may face boycotts and discrimination sometimes with government approval </s>
<s> Past targets of such actions had included Scientologist actors Tom Cruise and John unk as well as jazz pianist Chick unk </s>
<s> Also in January an open letter to then Chancellor unk unk appeared published as a newspaper advertisement in the International Herald Tribune drawing parallels between the organized oppression of Scientologists in Germany and Nazi policies unk by Germany in the </s>
<s> The letter was conceived and paid for by Hollywood lawyer unk Fields whose clients have included Tom Cruise and John unk and was signed by prominent figures in the US entertainment industry including the top executives of MGM Warner Bros Paramount Universal and Sony Pictures Entertainment as well as actors Dustin Hoffman and Goldie unk director Oliver Stone writers Mario unk and unk Vidal and talk show host Larry King </s>
<s> It echoed similar parallels drawn by the Church of Scientology itself which until then had received unk notice and was followed by lobbying efforts of Scientology celebrities in Washington </s>
<s> US Department of State spokesman Nicholas Burns rejected the Nazi comparisons in the open letter as unk and distanced the US government from Nazi comparisons made by the Church of Scientology saying We have criticized the Germans on this but we aren t going to support the Scientologists terror tactics against the German government </s>
<s> Chancellor unk commenting on the letter said that those who signed it don t know a thing about Germany and don t want to know </s>
<s> German officials argued that the whole fuss was unk up by the Scientologists to achieve what we won t give them tax exempt status as a religion </s>
<s> This is unk pure and simple </s>
<s> Officials explained that precisely because of Germany s Nazi past Germany took a determined stance against all radical cults and unk including right wing Nazi groups and not just against Scientology </s>
<s> unk s Christian Democratic Union party denounced the letter as absurd and cited German court unk stating that Scientology had primarily economic goals and could legitimately be referred to using phrases such as a unk unk of oppression </s>
<s> In February a United States immigration court judge granted unk to a German Scientologist who claimed she would be subject to religious persecution in her homeland </s>
<s> In April John unk met personally with US President Bill Clinton at a conference in Philadelphia </s>
<s> unk later said Clinton assured him that he would really love to help with the issue over in Germany with Scientology </s>

<s> J C W unk John unk unk unk August January was the Governor of Kentucky and a United States Senator from Kentucky </s>
<s> He was the state s first popularly elected senator following passage of the Seventeenth Amendment </s>
<s> unk from a prominent political family unk was chosen as Democrat William unk s running mate in the gubernatorial election of despite the fact that he was not yet of legal age to serve as governor if called to do so </s>
<s> unk lost the election to Republican William S Taylor but the Kentucky General Assembly disputed the election results </s>
<s> During the political wrangling that followed an unknown assassin shot unk </s>
<s> A day later the General Assembly unk enough votes to give the election to unk who was sworn into office on his deathbed </s>
<s> Taylor claimed the election had been stolen by the Democratic majority in the General Assembly and a legal fight ensued between him and unk over the governorship </s>
<s> unk ultimately prevailed and Taylor fled the state </s>
<s> Following his term as governor unk made a bid to become a US </s>
<s> Senator </s>
<s> His stance in favor of prohibition cost him the votes of four legislators in his own party and the seat went to Republican William O Bradley </s>
<s> Six years later unk secured the seat by popular election but he lost his re election bid largely because of his pro temperance views and his opposition to women s suffrage </s>
<s> Though he continued to play an active role in state politics for another two decades he never returned to elected office failing in his gubernatorial bid in and his unk campaign in </s>
<s> He died in Louisville on January </s>
<s> Early life J C W unk was born at unk near unk in Nelson County Kentucky son of William unk and Julia unk unk unk </s>
<s> His maternal grandfather Charles A </s>
<s> unk was governor of Kentucky from to and served as unk general in the administration of John Tyler </s>

<s> unk obtained his early education at unk Academy in unk </s>

<s> He was admitted to the bar and commenced practice in unk in </s>
<s> He also served as president of the Young Democrats Club of Nelson County </s>
<s> Political career unk s political career began in when he was elected without opposition to the Kentucky House of Representatives </s>
<s> He served four consecutive terms and was Speaker of the House in his final year in the House </s>
<s> He also served as a delegate to every Democratic National Convention from to </s>
<s> Governor of Kentucky Democrat William unk chose unk as his running mate in the Kentucky gubernatorial election of </s>
<s> unk was hesitant about the selection because he wanted someone who could deliver the vote of his home county in the general election and unk s native Nelson County was already committed to a rival candidate </s>
<s> But friends of unk assured him that unk would be loyal to unk s reform agenda whereas the two other men unk was considering as running mates would stack the Senate committees against him </s>
<s> unk was not yet the minimum age to serve as governor at the time of his selection </s>
<s> unk lost a close election to Republican William S Taylor </s>
<s> When the General Assembly s session opened on January the election results were immediately challenged </s>
<s> With Democrats in control of both houses of the Assembly the results seemed sure to be reversed </s>
<s> The Assembly was still unk on January when unk was shot by an unknown assailant as he entered the state capitol building </s>
<s> The following day as unk was being treated for his wounds at a local hotel the General Assembly unk enough votes to give him the election </s>
<s> He was sworn into office from his bed the same day </s>
<s> Three days later unk died never having risen from the bed </s>
<s> Legislative chaos ensued as Taylor refused to acknowledge the Assembly s decision and unk the governorship </s>
<s> The Republicans in the legislature unk Taylor s orders while the Democrats ignored Taylor and followed the orders of their leadership </s>
<s> Finally on February Taylor and unk agreed to let the courts settle the matter </s>
<s> The case first went before the Louisville Circuit Court which found in favor of unk </s>
<s> Republicans appealed to the Kentucky Court of Appeals at that time the court of last resort in the state </s>
<s> On April the Court of Appeals upheld the ruling of the lower court </s>
<s> Taylor appealed to the Supreme Court of the United States which declined to hear the case on May </s>
<s> Taylor s only supporter on the court was unk John Marshall unk </s>

<s> unk now of age won the election over Republican John W unk by fewer than votes </s>

<s> He recommended passage of a law to set uniform school textbook prices a reform both he and unk had advocated during the gubernatorial campaign </s>
<s> However his passive leadership ensured that the General Assembly did little to address his agenda </s>
<s> The only major pieces of legislation passed during unk s term were a tax increase that added a half million dollars to the state s revenue and a child labor law that forbade children under to work without their parents consent </s>
<s> Second term Although the Kentucky Constitution prohibited governors from serving consecutive terms unk announced he would seek a full term as governor in </s>

<s> Near the close of the session legislators approved the creation of unk County from parts of Carter Elliott and Lewis counties </s>

<s> During the legislative session unk urged investigation and prosecution of corrupt insurance companies following the lead of New York attorney Charles Evans Hughes </s>
<s> In particular he recommended reducing the practice of deferred unk which allowed the insurance companies to keep large stores of cash on hand for illegal purposes </s>
<s> He further advocated that insurance companies doing business in the state be required to invest a certain percentage of their earnings in Kentucky unk the its economy and providing unk some protection against fraud </s>

<s> New Zealand Native football team The New Zealand Native football team was a New Zealand rugby union team that toured Britain Ireland Australia and New Zealand in and </s>
<s> It mostly comprised players of Māori ancestry and also included some unk white New Zealanders </s>
<s> A wholly private unk the tour was not under the auspices of any official rugby authority it was organised by New Zealand international player Joseph unk promoted by civil servant Thomas unk and managed by James Scott a unk </s>
<s> The unk were the first New Zealand team to perform a unk and also the first to wear all black </s>
<s> They played rugby matches during the tour as well as a small number of Victorian Rules football and association football matches in Australia </s>
<s> Having made a significant impact on the development of New Zealand rugby the unk were inducted into the International Rugby Board Hall of Fame in </s>
<s> After a preliminary tour of New Zealand in the side travelled to England via Melbourne and Suez </s>
<s> The Māori players initially provoked curiosity due to their race but the British press subsequently expressed some surprise that the side was not as Māori as they had expected </s>
<s> Playing their first match on October against Surrey the team was subjected to a taxing match schedule and frequently played three matches per week </s>
<s> Their early matches included a loss to Middlesex but their form improved in November when they won of their matches </s>
<s> The team played its first international match on December against Ireland and won </s>
<s> This was followed by a win over one of the strongest English county teams Yorkshire and a defeat against the Wales national team </s>
<s> By January the unk had played matches in less than three months winning of them they had spent most of their time in the north of England where the playing strength was strongest and the crowds largest and most profitable </s>
<s> In a return match on January Yorkshire fielded a stronger side than in the first match and inflicted one of the unk heaviest losses a defeat </s>
<s> The team then went undefeated until February when they faced England </s>
<s> Officials of the strictly amateur Rugby Football Union RFU had become increasingly concerned at the behaviour of the New Zealanders regarding them as unsportsmanlike and tensions reached a nadir in the aftermath of the England international during which the RFU secretary George Rowland Hill unk the game awarded a number of controversial tries to England prompting three of the unk to temporarily leave the field in protest England eventually won </s>
<s> The unk apologised afterwards for their behaviour but the damage was not repaired </s>
<s> The New Zealanders left England without an official send off and travelled to Australia where they toured Victoria New South Wales and Queensland </s>
<s> They then returned to New Zealand where they displayed a level of combination not seen in their home country before </s>
<s> They went games undefeated before losing their final match on August to Auckland </s>
<s> The unk final record in rugby matches was wins draws and losses </s>
<s> They introduced a number of tactical innovations to New Zealand rugby on their return home and their tour contributed to the formation of the New Zealand Rugby Football Union in </s>
<s> Seventeen of the team s players went on to play unk in New Zealand and two Thomas unk and David unk subsequently captained the New Zealand national rugby team </s>
<s> Background The idea for assembling a team of Māori footballers to tour Britain was conceived by Joseph unk a rugby player who had toured with the first New Zealand national team in </s>
<s> He initially proposed a team of Māori or part Māori to play the touring British side in this developed into a venture to have a Māori team tour Britain if a preliminary tour of New Zealand were successful </s>
<s> unk of unk s plans civil servant Thomas unk contacted him to offer help managing the tour which unk accepted </s>
<s> When James Scott a unk subsequently joined the partnership the three men decided that unk would be the team s captain Scott its manager and unk its promoter </s>
<s> unk started assembling a team for the tour in early </s>
<s> He had difficulties assembling a squad due to player availability and failed to secure the talented Jack unk due to his university commitments </s>
<s> Some Māori players who initially agreed to play later pulled out when the eligibility criteria were relaxed to allow squad members who were only part Māori </s>
<s> Twenty Māori or part Māori players joined the squad five unk white New Zealand players were added after the team lost to Auckland </s>
<s> Due to the inclusion of these unk players the team was renamed from the New Zealand unk to the New Zealand Native Football Representatives </s>
<s> The final squad comprised players including unk of these at least five were full unk Māori while fourteen had a Māori mother and a unk father </s>
<s> The parentage of some of the players is unknown </s>
<s> The team toured New Zealand before departing overseas playing against unk s Bay Auckland Nelson Wellington Canterbury South Canterbury and unk </s>
<s> The first game was contested against unk s Bay in Napier on June </s>
<s> They played nine games in their preliminary tour of New Zealand and won seven of them </s>

<s> unk in England and early matches The team were met in Britain by local rugby administrators including an official of England s Rugby Football Union RFU </s>
<s> The first match of the tour was against Surrey where the team became the first New Zealand side to perform a unk and also the first to wear an all black uniform </s>
<s> That the team was predominantly Māori provoked curiosity from the British press at the time most Britons had not seen non white people but there was some surprise that the team were not as Māori as had been expected </s>
<s> They are not unlike Europeans a Scottish reporter wrote in November that is their resemblance is great when one remembers that they were a savage tribe no further back than a generation </s>

<s> The match was also of historical importance because of the Welsh tactics employed </s>
<s> In the Home Nations Championship Wales had unk the four three quarter system wherein the team would play with eight forwards rather than nine and instead employ an extra centre three quarter </s>
<s> The system was deemed a failure and was particularly unpopular with star Welsh player Arthur Gould whose formidable ability as a back allowed his club team Newport to retain the additional forward </s>
<s> With Gould working in the West Indies Wales again tried the four three quarter system against the unk and its success saw the team permanently adopt the system </s>
<s> Within six years the other three Home Countries had adopted four three quarter style of play </s>

<s> England international The match against England was causing the unk players and management problems before it had even begun </s>
<s> The team manager Scott was in dispute with the RFU over where the match should be played the RFU were adamant that the match should take place at unk s ground but Scott wanted the game to proceed at The Oval where a larger crowd and therefore higher gate receipts could be secured </s>
<s> The strictly amateur RFU establishment were already suspicious of the profit making motives of the unk and were unwilling to yield on the selection of venue </s>
<s> The RFU was also in dispute with the other Home unk over the formation of the International Rugby Football Board unk </s>
<s> Following a disputed try in an England Scotland international match in the Scottish authorities had pushed for the establishment of an international body to oversee the game but the RFU insisted that they would only join if they held a deciding vote arguing that they deserved this as they were they asserted the senior body and had the most member clubs </s>
<s> Ireland Wales and Scotland consequently refused to play against England until when following arbitration the RFU relented and joined the unk </s>
<s> The absence of international matches was a factor in England agreeing to face the unk on February </s>
<s> The line ups selected for the February match were both strong and close to full strength </s>
<s> Though of the England side had not played internationally before all were experienced at domestic level </s>
<s> The match was unk by Rowland Hill who had also unk the unk first match in Britain against Surrey </s>
<s> The opening of the first half was a scoreless affair with much tackling and unk on the heavy ground </s>
<s> Later in the half England scored two tries through Harry Bedford but both were disputed by the unk who claimed that one of their players had grounded the ball in goal </s>
<s> England took the two try advantage into the second half </s>
<s> Early in the second half a third disputed try was scored by the English </s>
<s> The try and its aftermath caused controversy and a rift between the unk and the RFU </s>
<s> unk attempted to tackle the English player unk and in the process ripped his shorts off </s>
<s> The unk quickly formed a circle around unk to allow him to replace his clothing without being seen </s>
<s> While this was happening one of the English players Frank unk picked up the ball and scored a try </s>
<s> The New Zealanders protested believing that play had stopped after claiming unk had called dead ball but Hill awarded the try prompting three of the Native players Dick unk Williams and unk unk to leave the field in protest </s>
<s> The unk players were eventually persuaded to return but not before Hill had unk play </s>
<s> unk was very critical of Hill particularly because he was also Secretary of the RFU </s>
<s> unk wrote after the tour that gross as these errors were they were insignificant when compared with another that Mr Hill committed at the outset of the game unk unk at all in that game </s>
<s> The disputed try was followed by a final try for the English who ultimately won </s>
<s> The RFU at Hill s instigation promptly demanded an apology from the unk captain of the day Edward unk who had led the team as Joe unk was injured </s>
<s> The English authorities of the time believed that the decision of a referee was above question and that protesting a decision as the New Zealanders had done was unsportsmanlike </s>
<s> The RFU threatened to bar any of their affiliated players in other words the entire rugby playing population of England from facing the unk if they did not unk </s>
<s> unk swiftly sent an apology by telegram but this was deemed inadequate he therefore sent another four days after the game The London establishment that governed the game were disturbed by the New Zealanders approach to the game reports of rough and over aggressive play by the unk had steadily increased in frequency since their arrival in Britain </s>
<s> In the north of England criticism of the visitors unk was rarer the tourists were accepted as playing the game in the same spirit as their local opponents which in the north was a more working class sport than in the south </s>
<s> Some of the unk including Joe unk accused the RFU and the English press of hypocrisy claiming that they were quick to unk the New Zealanders for rough play yet tolerant of similar behaviour from their own players </s>
<s> Later matches and departure from England The unk remained in London following the England international </s>

<s> Australia The majority of the unk left Plymouth on March unk and Pie unk followed a week later </s>

<s> Impact and legacy The tour had a significant impact on the development of rugby within New Zealand </s>
<s> It was the first tour of the British Isles by a team from the Southern Hemisphere and the longest in the history of the sport </s>
<s> By the time the unk returned to New Zealand they had developed into a side superior to any in the country and introduced a number of tactical innovations </s>
<s> Seventeen of the players went on to play unk in New Zealand and two unk and David unk subsequently captained New Zealand </s>

<s> The custom of the time dictated that North American musicians travel to Europe for training if they desired a unk professional career and in July at the age of seventeen unk set out for Europe financed by her aunt and uncle Lady unk unk and Sir Wilfrid unk </s>

<s> Return to North America Arriving in New York unk struggled to find a niche in an already crowded music scene </s>

<s> unk of critics and audiences unk was a controversial musician in her time </s>
