<s> Battle of Sullivan s Island The Battle of Sullivan s Island or the Battle of Fort Sullivan was fought on June during the American Revolutionary War </s>
<s> It took place near Charleston South Carolina during the first British attempt to capture the city from American rebels </s>
<s> It is also sometimes referred to as the First Siege of Charleston owing to a more successful British siege in unk </s>
<s> The British organized an expedition in early for operations in the rebellious southern colonies of North America </s>
<s> unk by logistical concerns and bad weather the expedition reached the coast of North Carolina in May </s>
<s> Finding conditions unsuitable for their operations General Henry Clinton and Admiral Sir Peter Parker decided instead to act against Charleston </s>
<s> Arriving there in early June troops were landed on Long Island near Sullivan s Island where Colonel William unk commanded a partially constructed fort in preparation for a naval bombardment and land assault </s>
<s> General Charles Lee commanding the southern Continental theater of the war would provide supervision </s>
<s> The land assault was frustrated when the channel between the two islands was found to be too deep to unk and the American defenses prevented an amphibious landing </s>
<s> The naval bombardment had little effect due to the sandy soil and the unk nature of the fort s unk log construction </s>
<s> unk fire by the defenders wrought significant damage on the British fleet which withdrew after an entire day s bombardment </s>
<s> The British withdrew their expedition force to New York and did not return to South Carolina until unk </s>
<s> Background When the American Revolutionary War broke out in the city of Charleston in the colony of South Carolina was a center of commerce in southern North America </s>
<s> The city s citizens joined other colonists in opposing the British parliament s attempts to tax them and militia recruitment increased when word arrived of the April Battles of Lexington and Concord </s>
<s> Throughout and into militia recruits arrived in the city from the colony s unk the city s manufacturers and tradesmen began producing war materiel and defensive fortifications began to take shape around the city </s>
<s> British operations British army forces in North America were primarily tied up with the Siege of Boston in </s>
<s> unk bases of operations where they had more control the British planned an expedition to the southern colonies </s>
<s> Major General Henry Clinton then in Boston was to travel to Cape Fear North Carolina where he would join with largely Scottish unk raised in the North Carolina unk and a force of men from Ireland under the command of Major General Charles Cornwallis </s>
<s> The plan was beset by difficulties from the start </s>
<s> The Irish expedition originally supposed to depart at the beginning of December was delayed by logistical difficulties and its troops did not depart until February escorted by warships under the command of Admiral Sir Peter Parker </s>
<s> Clinton left Boston on January with two companies of light infantry and first stopped at New York City to confer with William Tryon New York s royal governor </s>
<s> Major General Charles Lee sent by Major General George Washington to see to the defense of New York unk arrived there the same day as Clinton </s>
<s> New York was at that time extremely tense unk forces were beginning to unk and evict unk and the British fleet anchored there was having difficulty acquiring provisions </s>
<s> Despite this Clinton made no secret that his final target was in the south </s>
<s> Lee observed that this was certainly a unk way of proceeding to communicate his full plan to the enemy is too novel to be credited </s>
<s> This was not even the first notice of the expedition to the colonists a letter intercepted in December had already provided intelligence that the British were planning to go to the South </s>
<s> Clinton arrived at Cape Fear on March expecting to find the European convoy already there </s>
<s> He met with the royal governors of North and South Carolina Josiah Martin and William Campbell and learned that the recruited Scottish unk had been defeated at Moore s Creek Bridge two weeks earlier </s>
<s> Clinton also received pleas for assistance from the royal governor of Georgia James Wright who had been arrested and then escaped to a navy ship </s>
<s> Parker s fleet had an extremely difficult crossing </s>
<s> unk by storms and high seas the first ships of the fleet did not arrive at Cape Fear until April and Cornwallis did not arrive until May </s>
<s> After several weeks there in which the British troops raided unk properties Clinton Cornwallis and Parker concluded that Cape Fear was not a suitable base for further operations </s>
<s> Parker had sent out some ships on unk expeditions up and down the coast and reports on the partially finished condition of the Charleston defenses were sufficiently promising that the decision was made to go there </s>
<s> American defenses John unk recently elected president of the General Assembly that remained as the backbone of South Carolina s revolutionary government organized a defense force under the command of year old Colonel William unk a former unk and Indian fighter </s>
<s> These forces comprised three infantry regiments two rifle regiments and a small artillery regiment they were augmented by three independent artillery companies and the total force numbered about </s>
<s> These forces were further augmented by the arrival of Continental regiments from North Carolina and Virginia troops as well as militia numbering from Charleston and the surrounding unk </s>
<s> unk saw Sullivan s Island a sandy unk of land at the entrance to Charleston Harbor extending north about miles </s>
<s> km long and a few hundred yards wide as a place well suited to build a fort that could protect the entrance from unk enemy warships </s>
<s> A large vessel sailing into Charleston first had to cross Charleston Bar a series of submerged unk lying about miles km southeast of the city and then pass by the southern end of Sullivan s Island as it entered the channel to the inner harbor </s>
<s> Later it would also have to pass the northern end of James Island where Fort Johnson commanded the southeastern approach to the city </s>
<s> unk and his South Carolina Regiment arrived on Sullivan s Island in March and began construction of a fortress to defend the island and the channel into Charleston Harbor </s>
<s> The construction moved slowly Captain Peter unk of the unk naval detachment described the site as an immense pen feet long and feet wide filled with sand to stop the shot </s>
<s> The gun platforms were made of unk two inches thick and unk with wooden spikes </s>
<s> Congress had appointed General Lee to command the Continental Army troops in the southern colonies and his movements by land shadowed those of Clinton s fleet as it sailed south </s>
<s> Lee wrote from Wilmington on June that the fleet had sailed but that he did not know whether it was sailing for Virginia or South Carolina </s>
<s> He headed for Charleston saying I confess I know not whether I shall go to or from the enemy </s>
<s> He arrived in Charleston shortly after the fleet anchored outside the harbor and took command of the city s defenses </s>
<s> He immediately ran into a problem the South Carolina troops militia or the colonial regiments were not on the Continental line and thus not formally under his authority </s>
<s> Some South Carolina troops resisted his instructions and unk had to intervene by proclaiming Lee in command of all South Carolina forces </s>
<s> Square shaped Fort Sullivan consisted only of the completed seaward wall with walls made from unk logs feet </s>
<s> m high and feet </s>
<s> m wide </s>
<s> The walls were filled with sand and rose feet </s>
<s> m above the wooden platforms on which the artillery were mounted </s>
<s> A hastily erected palisade of thick unk helped guard the powder magazine and unfinished northern walls </s>
<s> An assortment of cannon ranging from unk and pounders to a few British pounders and French pounders dotted the front and rear walls </s>
<s> General Lee when he had seen its unfinished state had recommended abandoning the fort calling it a slaughter pen </s>
<s> President unk refused and specifically ordered Colonel unk to obey Lee in everything except in leaving Fort Sullivan </s>
<s> unk s delaying tactics so angered Lee that he decided on June that he would replace unk the battle began the next day before he could do so </s>
<s> Lee did make plans for an orderly retreat to unk s Point </s>
<s> British arrival The British fleet weighed anchor at Cape Fear on May and arrived outside Charleston Harbor the next day </s>
<s> unk noticed a British scout boat apparently looking for possible landing points on nearby Long Island now known as the Isle of unk just a few hundred yards from Sullivan s Island troops were consequently sent to occupy the northern end of Sullivan s </s>
<s> By June most of the British fleet had crossed the bar and anchored in Five unk Hole an anchorage between the bar and the harbor entrance </s>
<s> With the fort on Sullivan s Island only half complete Admiral Parker expressed confidence that his warships would easily breach its walls </s>
<s> unk believing he would not even need Clinton s land forces he wrote to Clinton that after the fort s guns were knocked out he would land unk and marines which I have practiced for the purpose under the guns and that they could keep possession till you send as many troops as you think proper </s>
<s> The British fleet was composed of nine man of war ships the flagship gun Bristol as well as the gun Experiment and frigates unk Active unk unk unk Friendship and the bomb vessel Thunder in total mounting nearly cannon </s>
<s> The army forces in the expedition consisted of the and Regiments of Foot and part of the </s>
<s> On June Clinton issued a proclamation calling on the rebel colonists to lay down their arms </s>
<s> However the inexperienced defenders fired on the boat sent to deliver it which was flying a truce flag and it was not delivered until the next day </s>
<s> That same day Clinton began landing troops on Long Island </s>
<s> The intent was that these troops would unk across the channel now known as unk Inlet between Long and Sullivan s which the British believed to be sufficiently shallow to do so while the fleet bombarded Fort Sullivan </s>
<s> General Lee responded to the British landing with several actions </s>
<s> He began reinforcing positions on the mainland in case the British were intending to launch an attack directly on Charleston </s>
<s> He also attempted to build a bridge of boats to provide an unk of retreat for the fort s garrison but this failed because there were not enough boats to bridge the roughly one mile </s>
<s> km channel separating the island from Charleston the unwillingness of unk and unk to support the effort may also have played a role </s>
<s> The Americans also constructed an unk at the northern end of Sullivan s Island which was manned by more than men and three small cannons and began to unk a guard post at unk s Point on the mainland opposite Fort Sullivan </s>
<s> General Clinton encountered the first major problem of the attack plan on June </s>
<s> An attempt to unk the channel between the two islands established that part of the channel was at least shoulder deep too deep for troops to cross even without the prospect of enemy opposition </s>
<s> He considered using boats to ferry the troops across but the Americans with timely advice from General Lee adopted a strong defensive position that was virtually impossible to bombard from ships or the Long Island position </s>
<s> As a result the British and American forces faced each other across the channel engaging in occasional and largely unk cannon fire at long range </s>
<s> Clinton reported that this meant that Admiral Parker would have the glory of being defeated alone </s>
<s> The attack was originally planned for June but bad weather and contrary wind conditions prompted Parker to call it off for several days </s>
<s> Battle On the morning of June Fort Sullivan was defended by Colonel unk commanding the South Carolina Regiment and a company of the South Carolina Artillery numbering men </s>
<s> At around am that morning a British ship fired a signal gun indicating all was ready for the attack </s>
<s> Less than an hour later nine warships had sailed into positions facing the fort </s>

<s> miles </s>

<s> Hu unk Hu unk Chinese unk c unk was a Chinese artist unk and publisher </s>
<s> He worked in calligraphy traditional Chinese painting and seal carving but was primarily a publisher producing academic texts as well as records of his own work </s>
<s> Hu lived in unk during the transition from the Ming dynasty to the Qing dynasty </s>
<s> A Ming loyalist he was offered a position at the rump court of the unk Emperor but declined the post and never held anything more than minor political office </s>
<s> He did however design the unk Emperor s personal seal and his loyalty to the dynasty was such that he largely retired from society after the emperor s capture and death in </s>
<s> He owned and operated an academic publishing house called the Ten unk Studio in which he practised various multi colour printing and unk techniques and he employed several members of his family in this enterprise </s>
<s> Hu s work at the Ten unk Studio pioneered new techniques in colour unk leading to delicate unk of colour which were not previously unk in this art form </s>
<s> Hu is best known for his manual of painting entitled The Ten unk Studio Manual of Painting and unk an artist s unk which remained in print for around years </s>
<s> His studio also published seal catalogues academic and medical texts books on poetry and decorative writing papers </s>
<s> Many of these were edited and prefaced by Hu and his brothers </s>
<s> Biography Hu was born in unk County Anhui Province in unk or early unk </s>
<s> Both his father and elder brother unk unk art name unk unk were unk and after he turned he travelled with them while they practised medicine in the areas around Lu an and unk </s>
<s> It is commonly stated that unk himself was also a doctor though the earliest sources unk to this occur only in the second half of the century </s>
<s> By Hu had moved to unk where he lived with his wife Wu </s>
<s> Their home on unk unk now also known as unk unk a hill located just within the northern city wall served as a meeting house for like minded artists </s>
<s> Hu named it the Ten unk Studio unk unk after the ten bamboo plants that grew in front of the property </s>
<s> It functioned as the headquarters for his printing business where he employed ten artisans including his two brothers unk and unk unk art name unk unk and his sons unk unk and unk unk courtesy name unk </s>
<s> During Hu s lifetime the Ming dynasty which had ruled China for over years was overthrown and replaced by China s last imperial dynasty the Qing </s>
<s> Following the fall of the capital Beijing in remnants of the imperial family and a few ministers set up a Ming loyalist regime in unk with Zhu unk on the throne as the unk Emperor </s>

<s> According to unk unk s Lost History of the South unk unk unk prior to the Qing invasion of unk Hu studied at the National University there and whilst a student was employed by the Ministry of unk to record official unk he produced the Imperial Promotion of Minor Learning Qin Ban unk unk and the Record of unk unk unk Ji unk as part of this work </s>
<s> As a result he was promoted to the Ministry of Personnel and gained unk to the unk Academy but before he could take up this appointment Beijing had fallen to the unk rebellion </s>

<s> Seal carving Hu unk was a noted seal unk producing personal seals for numerous dignitaries </s>
<s> His style was rooted in the classical seal script of the Han dynasty and he followed the unk school of carving founded by his contemporary He unk </s>
<s> Hu s calligraphy although balanced and with a clear unk structure is somewhat more angular and rigid than the classical models he followed </s>
<s> unk seals attempt to unk an ancient weathered impression although unlike other unk artists Hu did not make a regular practice of artificially aging his seals </s>
<s> Hu s work was known outside his local area </s>
<s> Zhou unk a poet who lived in unk around the same time as Hu and was a noted art unk stated in his Biography of Seal unk unk unk unk that Hu creates miniature stone carvings with ancient seal inscriptions for travellers to fight over and treasure implying that his carvings were popular with visitors and travellers passing through unk </s>
<s> In Hu took it upon himself to create a new Imperial seal for the unk Emperor which he carved after a period of unk and prayer </s>
<s> He presented his creation with an essay the Great unk of the Seal unk unk unk in which he unk the loss of the unk Emperor s seal and unk Heaven s favour in restoring it </s>
<s> Hu was concerned that his essay would be overlooked because he had not written it in the form of rhyming equally footed couplets unk unk used in the Imperial examinations but his submission and the seal itself were nevertheless both accepted by the Southern Ming court </s>
<s> Ten unk Studio Despite his reputation as an artist and seal unk Hu was primarily a publisher </s>
<s> His publishing house the Ten unk Studio produced reference works on calligraphy poetry and art medical textbooks books on etymology and unk and copies of as well as commentaries on the Confucian Classics </s>
<s> Unlike other publishers in the area the Ten unk Studio did not publish works of narrative fiction such as plays or novels </s>
<s> This bias towards academia was likely a consequence of the studio s location the mountain on which Hu took up residence was just to the north of the unk unk National Academy which provided a captive market for academic texts </s>
<s> Between and the Ten unk Studio produced over twenty printed books of this kind aimed at a wealthy literary audience </s>
<s> The studio s earliest publications were medical textbooks the first of which unk unk for unk unk unk unk unk was published in and proved popular enough to be reissued ten years later </s>
<s> Hu s brother unk was a medical unk and appears to have been the author of these books </s>
<s> During the unk the Ten unk Studio also produced political works unk the rule of the Ming these included the Imperial Ming Record of unk Huang Ming unk Ji unk a biography of loyal Ming officials and the unk of the Imperial Ming Huang Ming unk unk a list of Imperial unk </s>
<s> After the fall of the Ming Dynasty Hu renamed the studio the Hall unk in the Past unk unk as a sign of his affiliation with the previous dynasty although the Ten unk imprint continued to be used </s>
<s> Despite Hu s withdrawal from society after the studio continued to publish well into the Qing dynasty for the most part unk on seal impression catalogues showcasing Hu s carving work </s>
<s> The Ming dynasty had seen considerable advancement in the process of colour printing in China </s>
<s> At his studio Hu unk experimented with various forms of unk printing creating processes for producing multi coloured prints and unk printed designs </s>
<s> As a result he was able to produce some of China s first printed publications in colour using a block printing technique known as unk block printing unk unk unk </s>
<s> This system made use of multiple blocks each carved with a different part of the final image and each bearing a different colour </s>
<s> It was a lengthy unk process requiring thirty to fifty engraved printing blocks and up to seventy unk and impressions to create a single image </s>
<s> Hu also employed a related form of multiple block printing called set block printing unk unk unk which had existed since the Yuan period some years earlier but had only recently come into fashion again </s>
<s> He refined these block printing techniques by developing a process for unk some of the ink off the blocks before printing this enabled him to achieve unk and unk of shades which were not previously possible </s>
<s> In some images Hu employed a blind unk technique known as unk designs unk unk or unk blocks unk unk using an unk unk block to stamp designs onto paper </s>
<s> He used this to create white relief effects for clouds and for highlights on water or plants </s>
<s> This was a relatively new process having been invented by Hu s contemporary Wu unk who was also a unk based publisher </s>
<s> Wu had used this technique for the first time in his book Wisteria Studio unk Paper unk unk unk unk published in unk </s>
<s> Both Hu and Wu used unk to create decorative writing papers the sale of which provided a unk income for the Ten unk Studio </s>
<s> Major works Hu s most notable work is the Ten unk Studio Manual of Painting and unk unk unk unk an anthology of around prints by around thirty different artists including Hu himself published in </s>
<s> It consists of eight sections covering calligraphy bamboo flowers rocks birds and animals plums orchids and fruit </s>
<s> Some of these sections had been released previously as single volumes </s>
<s> As well as a collection of artworks it was also intended as an artistic unk with instructions on correct brush position and technique and several pictures designed for unk to copy </s>
<s> Although these instructions only appear in the sections on orchids and bamboo the book still remains the first example of a unk and analytical approach to Chinese painting </s>
<s> In this book Hu used his multiple block printing methods to obtain unk of colour in the images rather than obvious outlines or overlaps </s>
<s> The manual is bound in the butterfly binding unk unk unk style whereby whole unk illustrations are folded so that each occupies a double page spread </s>
<s> This binding style allows the reader to lay the book flat in order to look at a particular image </s>
<s> Cambridge University Library released a complete digital scan of the manual including all writings and illustrations in August </s>
<s> Said Charles unk Head of the Cambridge University Chinese Department The binding is so fragile and the manual so delicate that until it was unk we have never been able to let anyone look through it or study it despite its unk importance to scholars </s>
<s> This volume went on to influence colour printing across China where it paved the way for the later but better known Manual of the unk unk Garden unk unk unk and also in Japan where it was reprinted and foreshadowed the development in unk e of the colour unk printing process known as unk e unk </s>
<s> The popularity of the Ten unk Studio Manual was such that print runs continued to be produced all the way through to the late Qing dynasty </s>
<s> Hu also produced the work Ten unk Studio unk Paper unk unk unk a collection of paper samples which made use of the unk stamped unk technique to make the illustrations stand out in relief </s>
<s> Whilst primarily a catalogue of decorative writing papers it also contained paintings of rocks people ritual vessels and other subjects </s>

<s> Gallery unk from the Ten unk Studio Manual of Painting and unk Raid on Manila The Raid on Manila of January was a Royal Navy false flag military operation during the French Revolutionary Wars intended to scout the strength of the defences of Manila capital of the Spanish Philippines capture a Manila galleon and assess the condition of the Spanish Navy squadron maintained in the port </s>
<s> Spain had transformed from an ally of Great Britain in the War of the First Coalition into an enemy in </s>
<s> Thus the presence of a powerful Spanish squadron at Manila posed a threat to the China Fleet an annual convoy of East unk merchant ships from unk in Qing Dynasty China to Britain which was of vital economic importance to Britain </s>
<s> So severe was this threat that a major invasion of the Spanish Philippines had been planned from British India during but had been called off following the Treaty of unk unk in Europe and the possibility of a major war in India between the British East India Company and the Kingdom of Mysore </s>
<s> To ensure the safety of the merchant ships gathering at unk in the winter of the British commander in the East Indies Rear Admiral Peter unk sent a convoy to China escorted by the frigates HMS unk and HMS Fox and commanded by Captain Edward Cooke </s>
<s> After completing his mission Cooke decided to investigate the state of readiness of Spanish forces in Manila himself </s>

<s> Background In after three years of the French Revolutionary Wars Spain and the French Republic signed the Treaty of San unk </s>
<s> The secret terms of this treaty required Spain to renounce its alliance with Great Britain and subsequently to declare war on its former ally </s>
<s> In the East Indies this shift of political allegiance meant that the dominant British forces in the region were faced with the threat of attack from the Spanish Philippines to the east </s>
<s> Britain dominated the East Indies in controlling the trade routes through the Indian Ocean from the ports of Bombay Madras and Calcutta </s>
<s> Dutch Ceylon the Dutch Cape Colony and parts of the Dutch East Indies had been captured in and the French presence in the region had been confined to Île de France and a few subsidiary islands in the Western Indian Ocean </s>
<s> Some of the most important trade routes began at unk and unk in Qing Dynasty China </s>
<s> Early in each year a large convoy known as the China Fleet composed of large East unk merchant ships in the employ of the British East India Company sailed unk to Europe from unk laden with tea and other commercial cargo </s>
<s> This convoy was economically significant to Britain one convoy in was valued at over million the equivalent of as of </s>
<s> In January the convoy had been attacked by the French squadron in the East Indies comprising six frigates commanded by unk unk Pierre César Charles de unk </s>
<s> In the ensuing unk Strait Incident the commander deceived unk into believing that the unk convoy contained disguised ships of the line and the French admiral retreated only learning of his error on his return to Île de France </s>
<s> There was considerable concern in India that unk might try again in or that the Spanish who maintained a powerful squadron at unk might make an attempt of their own </s>

<s> Co operating with the Governor General of India Sir John Shore and Colonel Arthur unk among others a substantial naval and military forces were earmarked for the operation which was in the advance planning stages when unexpected news arrived in India in August announcing the Treaty of unk unk which brought the War of the First Coalition to an end </s>
<s> Britain now faced France and Spain alone while unk from the Tipu Sultan of the Kingdom of Mysore an old opponent of Britain in Southern India were seeking French assistance with a renewed outbreak of hostilities </s>

<s> The convoy arrived without incident on December although the crews had been substantially weakened by tropical illnesses </s>
<s> Cooke s raids Reconnaissance of unk With his convoy safely at anchor in unk and the China Fleet several weeks from sailing Cooke decided to reconnoitre Manila and make observations on the port and the Spanish squadron based there </s>
<s> As an added motivation rumours in unk suggested that the annual Manila galleon was due to arrive </s>

<s> unk its dollars in the Philippines the ship then loaded trade goods from the East Indies for the return journey to New Spain </s>
<s> This round trip was essential to the maintenance of the Spanish Empire in the East Indies which operated at an enormous financial loss only unk by the substantial subsidy from New Spain </s>
<s> Spanish dollars were the accepted currency across most of the East Indies and disruption of this financial system could have profound effects on regional trade but British sailors had nevertheless been attacking the Manila unk since Thomas unk in unk </s>
<s> Leaving the heavier warships at unk Cooke sailed on January only with unk and Fox the latter carrying a Mr Bernard an experienced linguist </s>
<s> Passing Luzon Cooke s ships encountered a small Spanish merchant vessel which was lured towards the frigates which were flying French unk </s>
<s> unk the Spanish vessel Cooke closely questioned the captain and learned that most of the Spanish squadron in Manila were undergoing extensive repairs at unk and were unfit to sail </s>

<s> unk on unk Late in the afternoon of January unk and Fox arrived in Manila Bay slipping unk past the fortress of unk and then sailing across the bay on the morning of January anchoring between Manila and unk </s>
<s> From his unk point Cooke could see the Spanish squadron dismasted and under repair in unk the ships of the line San Pedro Europa and unk and the frigates Maria de la unk and unk in dock and unfit for action </s>

<s> Fox was the first British ship into the anchorage and was consequently approached by the unk whose crew came aboard </s>

<s> The Spanish officer was now completely convinced by the unk which had been augmented by fake French uniforms </s>
<s> unk the visitor below decks Cooke then passed wine around and together they drank a series of unk including the downfall of England </s>

<s> In Malcolm s cabin the captured officers were informed of their situation promised release before the British frigates sailed and offered more wine </s>
<s> The crew of Fox meanwhile forced the captured Spanish sailors to strip and unk their clothing </s>

<s> Taking the crews by surprise the British boarding parties drove off the Spanish without a fight and brought all three boats alongside Fox </s>
<s> These vessels normally carried crews of thirty and were well armed one with a pounder long gun and two with pounder long guns each supplemented by four unk guns </s>

<s> B of the Bang B of the Bang was a sculpture by Thomas unk next to the City of Manchester Stadium in Manchester England which was commissioned to mark the Commonwealth Games it was one of the tallest structures in Manchester and the tallest sculpture in the UK until the completion of unk in </s>

<s> Battle of the unk River The Battle of the unk River took place during the Second World War and involved Australian New Zealand and Japanese forces </s>
<s> Part of the wider unk Campaign of the Pacific theatre the battle was fought in the southern sector of unk Island </s>
<s> Coming after the Battle of unk s Knoll in which a strong Japanese counterattack was defeated the battle occurred in two distinct periods between April and May as elements of the Australian Brigade advanced south along the unk Road </s>
<s> The initial phase saw the Australians advance towards the unk River </s>
<s> Following the end of the early fighting the Australian advance towards the main Japanese concentration at unk continued as they struck out towards the unk and unk Rivers </s>
<s> This continued until torrential rain and flooding brought the advance to a halt short of the objective unk away many bridges and roads upon which the Australians relied for supplies </s>
<s> As the Australian advance stalled the Japanese began harassing the Australian line of communications and as the rain stopped and the flooding subsided in late July and into August the Australians began making preparations to resume the advance towards unk again </s>
<s> Ultimately though the war came to an end before the final Australian advance began bringing the campaign to an end </s>
<s> Background Strategic situation Japanese forces had landed on unk in early capturing it from the small force of Australians unk the island </s>
<s> They had subsequently developed several unk on the island using it to conduct operations in the northern Solomon Islands and to attack the Allied lines of communication between the United States Australia and the Southwest Pacific Area </s>
<s> These bases also helped protect Rabaul the major Japanese garrison and naval base in Papua New Guinea and throughout Allied planners determined that unk was vital for unk the Japanese base around Rabaul </s>
<s> US Marines conducted an amphibious landing at Cape unk on the western coast of the island north of Empress Augusta Bay in November </s>
<s> After an initial counter attack the US Marines had been replaced by a garrison of US Army troops who began consolidating their position around unk establishing a strong perimeter </s>
<s> In March the Japanese launched a heavy counter attack which was turned back with heavy casualties </s>
<s> After this the situation on unk became largely static as the Japanese focused primarily on subsistence and the US forces chose to adopt a mainly defensive posture focused on maintaining the perimeter around unk </s>
<s> In late as part of plans to free US troops up for the Philippines campaign the Australian II Corps consisting of mainly Militia troops under the command of Lieutenant General Stanley unk took over responsibility for Allied operations on unk from the American XIV Corps </s>
<s> Australian forces began arriving on the island between November and December initially establishing themselves around the US base at unk </s>
<s> Due to inaccurate intelligence unk mistakenly believed that the Japanese forces on the island numbered just men and he consequently decided that the Australians would pursue an aggressive campaign to clear the Japanese from unk in order to free their troops for subsequent operations elsewhere rather than maintaining the defensive posture the US forces had adopted </s>
<s> However Allied estimates of Japanese strength were later found to be grossly inaccurate and after the war it was found that the number of Japanese on the island at this time was closer to </s>
<s> The campaign that Australian planners developed entailed three separate drives in the north it was planned that Japanese forces would be forced into the narrow unk Peninsula and contained in the centre the seizure of Pearl Ridge would give the Australians control of the east west avenues of approach as well as unk them protection against further counter attacks while also opening the way for a drive to the east coast and the main campaign in the south where the bulk of the Japanese forces were concentrated around unk </s>
<s> Preliminary moves Following the capture of Pearl Ridge in December the Australian Brigade had been moved south and allocated to the drive towards unk </s>

<s> The Brigade was considered to be the most experienced of the Australian units on unk at the time and was moved up to relieve the Brigade which was in need of rest </s>
<s> Under the command of Brigadier unk unk the Brigade consisted of three infantry battalions as well as two troops of tanks from the Armoured Regiment engineers from the Field Company a battery of mm guns from U Heavy Battery field artillery from the Field Regiment and a number of smaller support units </s>
<s> The unk Infantry Battalion took over responsibility for unk s Knoll replacing the Infantry Battalion while the Infantry Battalion took up a position across the unk Road </s>

<s> Aftermath During the course of the fighting around the unk the Australians lost men killed and wounded while the Japanese lost at least men killed </s>
<s> Following the battle the Australians continued their advance towards unk at the southern end of the island </s>
<s> Throughout the remainder of the month and into June the Brigade advanced along the unk Road crossing the unk on June </s>

<s> As the Brigade advanced toward the unk River torrential rain and flooding ultimately brought the advance to a halt </s>
<s> The height of the river rose metres </s>
<s> ft </s>

<s> Sonic the Hedgehog video game Sonic the Hedgehog is a platform video game developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega for the Sega Genesis console </s>
<s> The game was first released in North America Europe and Australia in June and in Japan the following month </s>
<s> The game features an anthropomorphic unk named Sonic in a quest to defeat Dr unk a scientist who has imprisoned animals in robots and stolen the magical Chaos unk </s>
<s> Sonic the Hedgehog s gameplay involves collecting rings as a form of health and a simple control scheme with jumping and attacking controlled by a single button </s>
<s> The game s development began in when Sega ordered its unk development team to create a game featuring a mascot for the company </s>
<s> After considering a number of suggestions the developers decided on a blue unk with spikes along his head and spine and renamed themselves Sonic Team to match their character </s>
<s> Sonic the Hedgehog designed for fast gameplay was influenced by the games of Super Mario series creator Shigeru Miyamoto </s>
<s> Sonic the Hedgehog uses a novel technique that allows Sonic s sprite to roll along curved scenery which originated in a tech demo created by the game s programmer unk unk </s>
<s> The game was well received by critics who praised its visuals music and speed of gameplay </s>
<s> The game was also commercially successful establishing the Genesis as a key player in the bit era and allowing it to compete with Nintendo and their Super unk console </s>
<s> It has been ported a number of times and inspired several unk a successful franchise and adaptations by other media </s>
<s> Plot In an attempt to steal the six Chaos unk and unk their power the game s antagonist Dr Ivo unk has trapped the animal inhabitants of South Island in aggressive robots and stationary metal capsules </s>
<s> The player controls Sonic who aims to halt unk s plans by freeing his animal friends and collecting the unk himself </s>
<s> If the player collects all the Chaos unk and completes the game a reward ending sequence is shown </s>
<s> If all the unk are not collected unk taunts the player while unk the Chaos unk instead </s>
<s> Gameplay Sonic the Hedgehog is a side scrolling platformer whose gameplay centers around Sonic s ability to run at high speed through levels incorporating springs slopes high falls and loop the loops </s>
<s> The levels contain unk in the form of robots unk in the Western game manuals inside of which Dr unk has trapped animals </s>
<s> Although destroying a robot frees the animal within this is not required to complete the game </s>
<s> The player must avoid rows of sharp spikes falling into unk pits being crushed by moving walls or platforms and drowning which can be avoided by breathing air bubbles periodically released from unk </s>
<s> Sonic s main attack is his spin where he unk into a ball and unk rapidly damaging enemies and some obstacles </s>
<s> This can be performed by jumping in the air or rolling on the ground </s>
<s> unk around each level map are gold rings and collecting rings rewards the player with an extra life </s>
<s> unk are a layer of protection against unk if Sonic has at least one ring when he unk with an enemy or obstacle he will survive </s>
<s> However all his rings will be scattered they will unk and disappear in a few seconds if they are not picked up again </s>
<s> If Sonic is hit without any rings he loses a life </s>
<s> Although shields and temporary unk may be collected to provide additional protection certain unk such as drowning being crushed falling down a unk pit or running out of time will cost Sonic a life regardless of rings or other protection </s>
<s> The game is divided into six zones Green Hill unk Spring Yard Labyrinth Star Light and unk Brain each with its own visual style and enemies </s>
<s> A player must navigate through each zone subdivided into three acts to progress </s>
<s> At the end of each zone s third act the player confronts Dr unk who pilots a different vehicle each time in a boss fight </s>
<s> After the sixth zone the player continues directly to the Final Zone for a last encounter with unk </s>
<s> The player begins with three lives power ups and rings add more which are lost when Sonic unk with hazardous enemies or objects without rings falls off screen or exceeds an act s ten minute time limit </s>
<s> unk acting as checkpoints allow Sonic to return to the most recently activated post when he loses a life </s>
<s> If he loses a life as a result of time running out but has another life the unk will reset to when he returns to the unk </s>
<s> If all lives are lost at any point in the game the game over screen will appear when the player can return to the beginning of the act with three lives if they have any continues </s>
<s> When Sonic reaches the end of act one or act two of a zone with at least fifty rings a large ring appears through which he can jump to enter a Special Stage a Secret Zone in the original Genesis manual </s>
<s> In each of six Special unk Sonic unk off the unk and walls of a rotating maze in spin attack </s>
<s> Although the player earns a continue with each rings found their main goal is to obtain the Chaos Emerald at the end of the maze without colliding with a goal block which ends the level </s>
<s> Development Background and character design In Sega ordered its in house development studio unk to develop a game featuring a mascot for the company </s>
<s> This was a position already held by the character Alex unk but he was considered similar to Mario and deemed unsatisfactory Sega president unk unk wanted a character as iconic as Mickey Mouse </s>
<s> Sega had competition from Nintendo and its mascot Mario in mind Nintendo was dominant at the time particularly after the release of the successful Super Mario Bros and Sega wanted a foothold in the industry </s>
<s> Although the company had some success with Genesis ports of its arcade titles it knew this would not be enough </s>
<s> unk developed ideas for characters an engine and gameplay mechanics </s>
<s> Development emphasized speed so unk eliminated character designs not associated with fast animals as well as fast creatures like unk and squirrels </s>
<s> One idea a unk able to grasp objects with prehensile ears showed promise at first but was too complex for the available hardware </s>
<s> The team narrowed its search to animals that can roll into a ball their idea for an attacking move </s>
<s> unk then realized that this would not seem aggressive enough so they focused on two animals with spikes unk and unk </s>
<s> The unk character first proposed by unk unk prevailed although the unk would later become the basis for Mighty the unk who first appeared in s unk the Hedgehog </s>
<s> unk has admitted since that he created Sonic s basic design by combining Felix the Cat s head with Mickey Mouse s body </s>
<s> Sonic was originally unk colored then a light shade of blue but he was changed to dark blue so he would stand out against certain backgrounds and to match the Sega logo </s>
<s> His shoes were colored red through the inspiration of Michael Jackson s boots on the album cover for Bad and the outfit of Santa Claus whom unk saw as the most famous character in the world </s>
<s> Sonic s spikes were emphasized to make him look unk and he was given the ability to spin while jumping so attacking and jumping could be controlled with one button </s>
<s> The new character was originally named Mr unk but the eight member unk changed his name to Sonic and their studios to Sonic Team </s>
<s> unk proposed to flesh out the character included placing him in a rock band giving him vampire fangs and giving him a human girlfriend named Madonna but Sega of America scrapped these ideas to keep his identity simple </s>
<s> Sega of America also expressed concerns that most Americans would not know what a unk is and initially proposed a full scale recreation of the character but compromised with Sonic Team to simply make design changes </s>
<s> The antagonist ended up being named Dr unk in Japan and Dr unk in other regions as a result of a dispute between Sega s American and Japanese divisions </s>
<s> Programming and unk With a satisfying protagonist completed Sega turned to esteemed programmer unk unk who had impressed them through his work on unk Star and the Genesis port of unk n unk </s>
<s> The gameplay originated with a tech demo by unk who developed an algorithm allowing a sprite to move smoothly on a curve by determining its position with a dot matrix </s>
<s> unk s prototype was a platform game with a fast moving character rolling in a ball through a long winding tube and this concept was unk out with unk s character designs and levels by designer unk unk </s>
<s> unk originally intended to work on the game for three months due to the delay of his planned move to the United States by the outbreak of the Gulf War but was unk in the project for nearly a year </s>
<s> His designs for levels were intended to attract both hardcore and casual gamers by integrating occasional challenging set pieces into the mostly accessible level design </s>
<s> The game s color scheme was influenced by the work of pop artist unk Suzuki and the aesthetics of Green Hill were influenced by the geography of California </s>
<s> In designing the game mechanics unk was inspired by Shigeru Miyamoto whose games he had enjoyed playing years earlier </s>
<s> unk the simplicity of Miyamoto s mechanics in complex environments unk decided that Sonic would be controlled with only a directional pad for movement and a single button for jumping </s>
<s> He also wanted his creation to be more action oriented than the Mario series while playing Super Mario Bros he had wondered why the levels could not be cleared more quickly </s>
<s> Due to the need to demonstrate the Genesis technological prowess the developing game underwent extensive testing and redesign a process taking over six months </s>
<s> The developers efforts were rewarded according to unk unk the game had the fastest ever character speed in a video game and a rotation effect in the special stages that was considered impossible on the console </s>
<s> The team intended to add a two player mode displayed via split screen but unk s programming knowledge was insufficient to implement this feature </s>
<s> However such a mode would later appear in sequel Sonic the Hedgehog where the second player would control Sonic s best friend Miles unk unk </s>
<s> unk unk and unk worked hours a day on the project for several months </s>
<s> unk s relationship with Sega of Japan was tenuous during this time he received little credit for his involvement in the game </s>
<s> He left the company shortly after the game s release although Sega of America hired him later </s>
<s> Before leaving however he defied Sega of Japan s prohibition of developer credits by displaying a few names in black text on a black background identifiable only by looking at the game s code </s>
<s> Music The music for Sonic the Hedgehog was composed and produced by Masato unk bassist and lead songwriter of the J pop band Dreams Come True </s>
<s> The game uses unk Yamaha unk and unk programmable sound generators to produce a variety of unk sound effects and music </s>

<s> Legacy unk on the industry Primarily because of its Genesis unk Sonic the Hedgehog contributed to the console s North American popularity </s>
<s> During October December the Genesis unk the Super unk by a two to one ratio and at its January peak claimed percent of the market for bit consoles </s>
<s> Although Nintendo eventually again overtook Sega this was the first time since December that the company did not lead the console market </s>

<s> The Same Old Story The Same Old Story is the second episode of the first season of the American science fiction drama television series Fringe </s>
<s> The episode was written by executive producer Jeff Pinkner and co creators J J Abrams Alex unk and Roberto Orci </s>
<s> When developing the series they sought to find a medium between serialized drama and the crime procedural </s>
<s> The Same Old Story was the first regular episode of Fringe and journalists viewed it as an example of what they could expect from the series </s>
<s> It was directed by Paul A Edwards </s>
<s> After a newborn baby rapidly ages into an year old man Fringe division agent Olivia Dunham Anna Torv and consultants Peter Joshua Jackson and Walter Bishop John Noble investigate </s>
<s> They tie the case to the murders of young women who have all had their unk glands removed </s>
<s> It is revealed that Dr Claus unk Mark unk an expert in unk is working to help his son Christopher Derek Cecil stay alive as he suffers from rapid aging syndrome </s>
<s> The Same Old Story first aired in the United States on September on Fox </s>
<s> An estimated </s>
<s> million viewers watched the episode a percent increase from the series premiere </s>
<s> The episode received mixed reviews from television critics reviewers thought it was an improvement from the previous episode but faulted it for containing plot unk </s>

<s> She dies as the doctors perform a unk section but the child ages rapidly in minutes soon dead having aged to the likes of an year old man </s>
<s> Olivia Dunham Anna Torv Peter Bishop Joshua Jackson and Walter Bishop John Noble new members of the Fringe division are called to investigate by division head Phillip unk Lance unk believing the case to be part of The Pattern a string of mysterious incidents </s>
<s> The woman is identified as having recently left a local unk and Olivia finds evidence that points to a past serial murder case she and her former partner John Scott were not able to solve </s>
<s> Olivia explains to Peter that their murderer would unk his victims young women then make an unk along their face to extract a piece of brain material killing the victim in the process </s>
<s> Walter takes both corpses back to his lab and determines that the woman had only been pregnant minutes before giving birth her child having accelerated aging disease </s>
<s> Walter is reminded of having previously done work in this field and remembers where he unk his car that contains the related files </s>
<s> Once they are retrieved Olivia makes a connection to the unk unk which controls growth in humans and informs Charlie Francis Kirk unk to monitor recent cases where the victims unk unk has been removed </s>
<s> Olivia and Peter turn to an expert in unk Dr unk Mark unk to trying to learn more about rapid aging but Dr unk cannot help them further though Peter suspects he is hiding something </s>
<s> Unseen by the Fringe division Dr unk visits an abandoned warehouse and meets the murderer Christopher Derek Cecil his son who suffers from rapid aging syndrome </s>
<s> unk warns Christopher to be careful and that they only need one more woman to complete the process </s>
<s> By this time Charlie has found a recent murder victim killed in the same fashion as Olivia s serial murderer </s>
<s> At Walter s lab they identify the unk unk has been removed </s>
<s> They unk the murderer must extract hormones from the glands to slow down his own aging process </s>
<s> Walter unk they can discover the location of the crime by looking at the images left in the woman s optical nerves induced by the unk unk </s>

<s> When Peter is out of unk Walter learns from Olivia that the FBI medical files on Peter s childhood are void of any details </s>
<s> Production Co creators J J Abrams Alex unk and Roberto Orci and executive producer Jeff Pinkner wrote the episode </s>
<s> Paul A Edwards served as the director his first such credit for the series </s>
<s> In developing Fringe the co creators did not want to make the series too serialized as this was a complaint often directed at Abrams television series unk </s>
<s> They wanted to find a balance between standalone stories and serialized content and studied procedural dramas such as Law and Order and unk Crime Scene Investigation for inspiration </s>
<s> unk explained While we make sure that our episodes are self contained have a beginning a middle and an end the character stories can be serialized </s>
<s> They don t have to resolve themselves over the course of one show </s>
<s> The Same Old Story was Fringe s first regular episode and some journalists viewed it as an example of how the series would be structured </s>
<s> The episode was based on actual recent research and involved much collaboration among the series different departments </s>
<s> For the scene in which they remove the victim s unk the special effects crew created a mold based on actress Elizabeth Stanley s head </s>
<s> Using plaster to make a prosthetic they drilled out the unk and unk ed it open and went through a series of molds </s>
<s> Stanley stated that it s really cool to see the head because it really does look just like me even though it s very gruesome because the unk s popping out </s>
<s> The prop department rigged a weapon which they called a unk gun according to prop master Peter unk this gun was based on real devices employed in airport security that look through people s clothing for concealed weapons </s>
<s> VFX Supervisor Christopher unk explained that for the eye s last vision they used a lot of actual photographic reference on the set and on the location which they then used to take that imagery and composite it into the various computer monitors and displays in the lab </s>

<s> Randy Blythe unk case The Randy Blythe unk case was a court case in the Czech Republic stemming from a Lamb of God concert in Prague wherein year old fan Daniel unk sustained head injuries leading to a coma and subsequent death </s>
<s> During the investigation Czech police unsuccessfully asked United States authorities for cooperation </s>
<s> When the band returned to the Czech Republic for another concert two years later its vocalist Randy Blythe was arrested charged with causing unk s death and unk in custody for five weeks </s>
<s> According to a verdict delivered by the Municipal Court in Prague on March it was proven that Blythe had thrown unk unk and thus had moral responsibility for his death </s>
<s> However due to the circumstances Blythe was not held unk liable and most of the blame lay with unk and security members </s>
<s> The unk was upheld by the Prague High Court on June </s>
<s> concert incident During a concert on May in the Prague club unk Blythe was involved in an incident that resulted in the death of Daniel unk a year old attending fan </s>
<s> According to unk statements cited by the Czech online daily newspaper unk following Blythe s arrest Blythe was chanting Come on up between songs which the newspaper stated may have been intended to invite applause from the audience and not a direct invitation to fans </s>
<s> The newspaper went on to report that the fan tried to climb onstage and was thrown by the singer from the stage falling backwards directly on his head </s>
<s> According to the same paper unk was not under the influence of drugs or alcohol suffered serious brain trauma fell into a coma and died weeks later from his injuries </s>
<s> A report about the concert at issue released on May by unk stated that one of the things that was unexpected was the behavior of the singer Randall Blythe who on a few occasions struck some fans in a relatively brutal way off the stage </s>
<s> The article also contains pictures one of them showing Blythe holding a fan down on the ground </s>
<s> Meanwhile another report released two days after the concert by unk alleged that Randy in a totally uncompromising way took down an unk fan who has climbed the podium several times </s>
<s> The front man clearly showed that it is his territory he struck the intruder down punched him a couple of times and sent him through the air off the podium without even stopping singing </s>
<s> On May the report by unk stated that some broken head was a testimony to the fact that the band does not like anybody on the stage while unk stated that the only negative thing about the concert was to say it unk unk approach of the band towards the stage divers when somebody tried to climb the stage he was brutally swept down </s>
<s> Following Blythe s arrest Tomáš unk a promoter of the concert said that there was no fight between the fan and Blythe and that it was an unfortunate incident which happened during the concert when someone climbed onto the stage where he was not supposed to be </s>
<s> According to the Lamb of God publicist Adrenaline PR the incident deals with a fan that three times during the concert jumped the unk and rushed Randy during the performance </s>

<s> unk and charges On June Blythe was arrested by the Czech police on suspicion of unk </s>

<s> Court unk and bail On June the State Attorney brought a motion to unk Blythe in pre trial detention as he considered Blythe a flight risk </s>

<s> unk and trial On November the spokesperson of the Prague State Attorney s Office announced that the police had formally closed their investigation and proposed to the State Attorney to unk Blythe </s>
<s> After reviewing the case file the State Attorney indicted Blythe on the aforementioned charges on November </s>

<s> Trials in the Czech Republic are public </s>
<s> In general the court is bound to decide on the deed as stated in the unk however it is not bound by its legal assessment by the State Attorney </s>
<s> Both the defendant and the State Attorney may appeal the decision the appeal would be heard by a panel of the Prague High Court consisting of three professional judges </s>
<s> A decision of second instance court is final and unk </s>
<s> Nevertheless an extraordinary appeal may be lodged by the defendant or the Supreme State Attorney which would be heard by the Supreme Court of the Czech Republic in unk an extraordinary appeal may however rest only on issues of law and does not provide for full review of the case </s>
<s> After exhausting all of these unk the defendant may also unk a petition to the Constitutional Court of the Czech Republic </s>
<s> The petition may be based on allegation of violation of rights under the Czech Constitution and Charter of unk Rights and Basic unk </s>

<s> Day of the trial The trial started on February </s>
<s> Blythe testified that when he wanted to see the club before the concert Lamb of God s unk told him that the club was terrible and unk </s>
<s> According to Blythe the unk went on saying that the stage was small there were too many people and that it was rather dangerous </s>
<s> Blythe who is unk took off his glasses before entering the stage which together with the smoke and light effects allegedly left him half blind </s>
<s> Blythe said that people could easily reach the band members or climb up to the stage </s>
<s> One of the fans who was identified as Milan unk by Czech newspapers and who was scheduled to testify later during the proceedings managed to climb the stage twice without being stopped by security </s>
<s> Blythe testified that during the first attempt unk rushed the stage and started waving his arms before stage diving </s>
<s> The second time he tried to put his arms around Blythe in an attempt to unk him </s>
<s> Blythe who according to his own words perceived this as a danger caught unk s collar pushed him on the ground unk on him and repeatedly told him to stop </s>

<s> Later when another fan tried to climb the stage Blythe thought that it was unk again </s>

<s> Blythe further commented that he saw the fan get up and that other fans showed him unk up </s>

<s> It was not until the arrest two years later that he found out about unk s death </s>
<s> Blythe further testified that he was not under the influence of alcohol during the concert and that he had never used any drugs </s>

<s> He further commented that in case of unk measures would be undertaken to avoid anything similar from happening at Lamb of God concerts again </s>
<s> First instance verdict On March the court delivered a verdict according to which Blythe was not unk liable for unk s death even though he had the moral responsibility for it </s>
<s> Consequently the court dismissed the damages claim and ordered the return of Blythe s bail </s>
<s> The court held that it was proven that Blythe had thrown unk off the stage </s>

<s> The hearing took place in Blythe s absence </s>
<s> Blythe s unk was upheld by the panel on June </s>

<s> US Route in Michigan US Highway US is a component of the United States unk Highway System that connects Everett Washington to the Upper Peninsula UP of the US state of Michigan with a separate segment that runs from unk Point New York to unk Maine </s>
<s> In Michigan the highway runs through the UP in two segments as a part of the state trunkline highway system entering the state at unk and ending at St Ignace in between US briefly traverses the state of Wisconsin </s>
<s> As one of the major transportation unk in the UP US is a major conduit for traffic through the state and neighboring northern Midwest states </s>
<s> Two sections of the roadway are included as part of the Great Lakes Circle unk and other segments are listed as state designated Pure Michigan unk </s>
<s> There are several memorial highway designations and historic bridges along US that date to the unk and </s>
<s> The highway runs through rural sections of the UP passing through two national and two state forests in the process </s>
<s> The route of what became US was used as part of two Indian trails before European settlers came to the UP and as part of the Michigan segments of the Theodore Roosevelt International Highway and the King s International Highway auto trails in the early century </s>
<s> The state later included these trails as part of M when the first state highway unk were designated in </s>
<s> Most of M was redesignated as part of US when the US Highway System was created on November </s>
<s> Since the several changes have unk the highway s routing through the UP </s>
<s> One such alteration eventually created a business loop that connected across the state line with Hurley Wisconsin and others pushed an originally inland routing of US closer to the Lake Michigan shoreline </s>
<s> With the creation of the Interstate Highway System part of US was rerouted to coincide with the new Interstate I though in the the US Highway was truncated and removed from the I freeway resulting in today s basic form </s>
<s> Route description According to a regional planning committee report US is a key highway for Michigan providing its main western gateway </s>
<s> The roadway plays an important role in the transportation of goods across the northern tier of states in the Midwest and is listed on the National Highway System NHS for its entire length </s>
<s> The NHS is a network of roadways important to the country s economy defense and mobility </s>
<s> Together with M US is part of a pair of primary unk that bridge the eastern and western sides of the UP </s>

<s> miles </s>
<s> unk km of roadway in Michigan is divided into a </s>
<s> mile </s>
<s> km western segment and a </s>
<s> unk mile </s>
<s> km eastern segment interrupted by a section that runs for </s>
<s> miles </s>
<s> km in the state of Wisconsin </s>
<s> Western segment US enters Michigan from Wisconsin for the first time north of downtown Hurley Wisconsin and unk Michigan over the state line that runs along the Montreal River </s>
<s> The highway crosses the river into unk County and passes a welcome center on the way into a commercial district north of downtown </s>
<s> Running along unk Drive US meets its only business route in Michigan at Douglas Boulevard </s>
<s> The business route was previously a full loop that ran west through downtown unk and crossed the border into Hurley and back to the main highway </s>
<s> The Wisconsin Department of Transportation has removed the signage on their side of the border which reduced the loop to a business spur that ends at the state line </s>
<s> US continues eastward through UP woodlands to the city of unk </s>
<s> While bypassing the community of Ramsay the highway crosses a branch of the Black River </s>
<s> The roadway enters Wakefield on the south side of Sunday Lake meeting M at a unk in town </s>

<s> US and M merge and run concurrently over the second branch of the unk Isle in the community of unk </s>
<s> This concurrency has the lowest traffic volume along the entire length of the highway within the state in the Michigan Department of Transportation MDOT recorded a daily average usage along the stretch of vehicles compared to the overall average of vehicles for the highway </s>
<s> At the end of the concurrency M turns northerly to run along Lake unk </s>
<s> The highway continues parallel to the state line from the unk area through the national forest toward unk </s>
<s> That unincorporated community is the home of the unk High School unk the basketball team featured on a series of ESPN commercials and a documentary series on the Sundance Channel </s>
<s> The area is also where the waters meet the rolling hills drain to Lake Superior via the unk River to Lake Michigan via the unk and unk rivers or to the Gulf of Mexico via the Wisconsin and Mississippi rivers </s>
<s> Also located in the area are the unk Wilderness and the Lac unk Desert Indian unk which includes the Lac unk Desert Casino and Resort </s>
<s> The highway travels southeasterly from unk around the many lakes and streams in the area and crosses into rural Iron County </s>
<s> US intersects Federal Forest Highway unk near Golden Lake in unk Township in the middle of the national forest </s>
<s> The trunkline then runs along the Iron River as it approaches the city of the same name and meets M </s>
<s> In town US intersects M before crossing the river and turning northeast out of the city </s>

<s> On the west side of town US meets US the two highways run concurrently along Crystal Avenue </s>
<s> The combined highway turns south onto Street and meets M s eastern terminus at the intersection between Street and Superior Avenue next to the county unk at the top of the hill </s>
<s> US US runs south out of Crystal Falls to the west of and parallel to the unk River </s>

<s> Eastern segment US US re enters Michigan where it crosses the unk River and subsequently meets M in unk Township north of Iron Mountain and unk </s>

<s> Both road and rail travel through the community of unk where they pass near the largest paper mill in the UP </s>
<s> The trunkline runs along the main street of Norway where the highway meets the eastern terminus of US </s>
<s> Then US continues east through rural Dickinson County to Vulcan passing north of unk Lake through the unk Country State Forest before crossing the Sturgeon River in unk and passing into unk County </s>
<s> In unk County the environment takes on a more agricultural character along US </s>

<s> US comes to a three way intersection and turns northeast merging onto US </s>

<s> At Harris the trunkline enters the unk Indian Community </s>
<s> Harris is on the unk County side of the reservation but as the highway continues east it crosses over to unk River on the Delta County side </s>
<s> The county line in between not only separates the two communities but also serves as the boundary between the Central and Eastern time zones </s>
<s> East of unk River the highway crosses the community s namesake waterway before intersecting the eastern terminus of M </s>
<s> The roadway crosses the Ford River prior to turning due east into the outskirts of unk </s>
<s> US US unk to four lanes along unk Street which forms the east west axis of the unk street grid </s>
<s> Near downtown the highway meets M which runs along the city s north south axis Lincoln Avenue </s>
<s> The unk merge and run north bypassing the traditional central business district for a different business corridor </s>

<s> Military history of Australia The military history of Australia spans the nation s year modern history from the early Australian frontier wars between unk and Europeans to the ongoing conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan in the early century </s>
<s> Although this history is short when compared to that of many other nations Australia has been involved in numerous conflicts and wars and war and military service have been significant influences on Australian society and national identity including the Anzac spirit </s>
<s> The relationship between war and Australian society has also been shaped by the enduring themes of Australian strategic culture and its unique security dilemma </s>
<s> As British unk the Australian colonies participated in Britain s small wars of the century while later as a unk dominion and then an independent nation Australia fought in the First World War and Second World War as well as in the wars in Korea Malaya Borneo and Vietnam during the Cold War </s>
<s> In the Post Vietnam era Australian forces have been involved in numerous international peacekeeping missions through the United Nations and other agencies including in the Sinai Persian Gulf unk Somalia East Timor and the Solomon Islands while more recently they have also fought as part of multi lateral forces in Iraq and Afghanistan </s>
<s> In total nearly Australians died during the course of these conflicts </s>
<s> War and Australian society For most of the last century military service has been one of the single greatest shared experiences of white Australian males and although this is now changing due to the professionalisation of the military and the absence of major wars during the second half of the century it continues to influence Australian society to this day </s>
<s> War and military service have been defining influences in Australian history while a major part of the national identity has been built on an unk conception of the Australian experience of war and of unk known as the Anzac spirit </s>
<s> These ideals include notions of endurance courage ingenuity humour unk unk and unk traits which according to popular thought defined the behaviour of Australian soldiers fighting at Gallipoli during the First World War </s>
<s> The Gallipoli campaign was one of the first international events that saw Australians taking part as Australians and has been seen as a key event in forging a sense of national identity </s>
<s> The relationship between war and Australian society has been shaped by two of the more enduring themes of Australian strategic culture unk with a powerful ally and expeditionary warfare </s>
<s> Indeed Australian defence policy was closely linked to Britain until the Japanese crisis of while since then an alliance with the United States has unk its security </s>
<s> unk this pattern of unk both for cultural reasons such as shared values and beliefs as well as for more unk security concerns has ensured that Australian strategic policy has often been defined by relations with its allies </s>
<s> Regardless a tendency towards strategic unk has also been evident with Australians often reluctant to think about defence issues or to unk resources until a crisis arises a trait which has historically resulted in unk for major military challenges </s>
<s> Reflecting both the realist and liberal unk of international relations and the conception of national interests a number of other important themes in Australian strategic culture are also obvious </s>
<s> Such themes include an acceptance of the state as the key actor in international politics the unk of notions of unk sovereignty a belief in the enduring relevance and legitimacy of armed force as a unk of security and the proposition that the status unk in international affairs should only be changed peacefully </s>
<s> Likewise unk collective security and defence self reliance have also been important themes </s>
<s> Change has been more evolutionary than revolutionary and these strategic unk have persisted throughout its history being the product of Australian society s democratic political tradition and unk Christian Anglo European heritage as well its associated values beliefs and economic political and religious ideology </s>
<s> These unk are also reflective of its unique security dilemma as a largely European island on the edge of the Asia Pacific and the unk circumstances of a middle power physically removed from the centres of world power </s>
<s> To be sure during threats to the core Australia has often found itself defending the periphery and perhaps as a result it has frequently become involved in foreign wars </s>
<s> Throughout these conflicts Australian soldiers known colloquially as unk have often been noted somewhat unk for both their fighting abilities and their humanitarian qualities </s>
<s> Colonial era British Forces in Australia From until the defence of the Australian colonies was mostly provided by British Army regular forces </s>
<s> Originally Marines protected the early settlements at Sydney Cove and Norfolk Island however they were relieved of these duties in by a British Army unit specifically recruited for colonial service known as the New South Wales Corps </s>
<s> The New South Wales Corps subsequently was involved in putting down a rebellion of Irish convicts at Castle Hill in </s>
<s> Soon however shortcomings in the corps convinced the War Office of the need for a more reliable garrison in New South Wales and Van unk s Land </s>
<s> Chief of these shortcomings was the Rum Rebellion a coup mounted by its officers in </s>
<s> As a result in January the unk Regiment of Foot arrived in Australia </s>
<s> By British infantry regiments had served in Australia as had a small number of artillery and engineer units </s>
<s> Although the primary role of the British Army was to protect the colonies against external attack no actual threat ever unk </s>
<s> The British Army was instead used in policing guarding convicts at penal institutions combating unk putting down convict rebellions as occurred at Bathurst in and to suppress Aboriginal resistance to the extension of European settlement </s>
<s> Notably British soldiers were involved in the battle at the unk unk in on the Victorian unk </s>

<s> However in Australia was established as a separate squadron under the command of a unk marking the first occasion that Royal Navy ships had been permanently stationed in Australia </s>
<s> The Royal Navy remained the primary naval force in Australian waters until when the Australia Station ceased and responsibility handed over to the Royal Australian Navy the Royal Navy s depots dockyards and structures were given to the Australian people </s>
<s> Frontier warfare The reactions of the native Aboriginal inhabitants to the sudden arrival of British settlers in Australia were varied but were inevitably hostile when the settler s presence led to competition over resources and to the occupation of the indigenous inhabitants lands </s>
<s> European diseases decimated Aboriginal populations and the occupation or destruction of lands and food resources sometimes led to starvation </s>
<s> By and large neither the British nor the unk approached the conflict in an organised sense and conflict occurred between groups of settlers and individual tribes rather than systematic warfare </s>
<s> At times however the frontier wars did see the involvement of British soldiers and later mounted police units </s>
<s> Not all Aboriginal groups resisted white encroachment on their lands while many unk served in mounted police units and were involved in attacks on other tribes </s>
<s> Fighting between unk and Europeans was localised as the unk did not form unk capable of sustained resistance </s>
<s> As a result there was not a single war but rather a series of violent engagements and massacres across the continent </s>
<s> unk or disorganised however a pattern of frontier warfare emerged with Aboriginal resistance beginning in the century and continuing into the early century </s>
<s> This warfare unk the popular and at times academic myth of peaceful settlement in Australia </s>
<s> Faced with Aboriginal resistance settlers often reacted with violence resulting in a number of indiscriminate massacres </s>
<s> Among the most famous is the Battle of unk in Western Australia in </s>
<s> Such incidents were not officially sanctioned however and after the unk Creek massacre in New South Wales in seven Europeans were hanged for their part in the killings </s>
<s> However in Tasmania the so called Black War was fought between and and aimed at driving most of the island s native inhabitants onto a number of isolated peninsulas </s>
<s> Although it began in failure for the British it ultimately resulted in considerable casualties amongst the native population </s>
<s> It may be inaccurate though to depict the conflict as one sided and mainly unk by Europeans on unk </s>
<s> Although many more unk died than British this may have had more to do with the technological and logistic advantages enjoyed by the Europeans </s>
<s> Aboriginal tactics varied but were mainly based on pre existing hunting and fighting practices using unk clubs and other primitive weapons </s>
<s> Unlike the indigenous peoples of New Zealand and North America on the main unk failed to adapt to meet the challenge of the Europeans </s>
<s> Although there were some instances of individuals and groups acquiring and using firearms this was not widespread </s>
<s> The unk were never a serious military threat to European settlers regardless of how much the settlers may have feared them </s>
<s> On occasions large groups of unk attacked the settlers in open terrain and a conventional battle ensued during which the unk would attempt to use superior numbers to their advantage </s>
<s> This could sometimes be effective with reports of them advancing in crescent formation in an attempt to outflank and surround their opponents waiting out the first volley of shots and then hurling their unk while the settlers unk </s>
<s> However such open warfare usually proved more costly for the unk than the Europeans </s>
<s> Central to the success of the Europeans was the use of firearms </s>
<s> However the advantages afforded by firearms have often been unk </s>
<s> Prior to the late century firearms were often unk muzzle loading smooth bore single shot unk with flint lock mechanisms </s>
<s> Such weapons produced a low rate of fire while suffering from a high rate of failure and were only accurate within metres ft </s>
<s> These deficiencies may have initially given the unk an advantage allowing them to move in close and engage with unk or clubs </s>
<s> Yet by significant advances in firearms gave the Europeans a distinct advantage with the six shot unk revolver the unk single shot breech loading rifle and later the unk Henry rifle as well as rapid fire rifles such as the Winchester rifle becoming available </s>
<s> These weapons when used on open ground and combined with the superior mobility provided by horses to surround and engage groups of unk often proved successful </s>
<s> The Europeans also had to adapt their tactics to fight their fast moving often hidden enemies </s>
<s> Tactics employed included night time surprise attacks and positioning forces to drive the natives off cliffs or force them to retreat into rivers while attacking from both banks </s>
<s> The conflict lasted for over years and followed the pattern of British settlement in Australia </s>
<s> Beginning in New South Wales with the arrival of the first Europeans in May it continued in Sydney and its surrounds until the </s>
<s> As the frontier moved west so did the conflict pushing into outback New South Wales in the </s>
