<s> The south west of Western Australia experienced warfare from to </s>

<s> In the Northern Territory conflict lasted even later still especially in central Australia continuing from the to the </s>

<s> Far more devastating though was the effect of disease which significantly reduced the Aboriginal population by the beginning of the century a fact which may also have limited their ability to resist </s>

<s> Colonial military forces From until each of the six colonial governments was responsible for their own defence </s>
<s> The colonies had gained responsible government between and and while the Colonial Office in London retained control of some affairs the Governor of the each colony was required to raise their own colonial militia </s>
<s> To do this they were granted the authority from the British crown to raise military and naval forces </s>
<s> Initially these were militias in support of British regulars but when military support for the colonies ended in the colonies assumed their own defence responsibilities </s>
<s> The colonial military forces included unpaid volunteer militia paid citizen soldiers and a small permanent component </s>
<s> They were mainly infantry cavalry and mounted infantry and were neither housed in barracks nor subject to full military discipline </s>
<s> Even after significant reforms in the including the expansion of the permanent forces to include engineer and artillery units they remained too small and unk to be considered armies in the modern sense </s>
<s> By the forces numbered men </s>
<s> Although they could not be compelled to serve overseas many volunteers subsequently did see action in a number conflicts of the British Empire during the century with the colonies raising unk to serve in Sudan South Africa and China </s>
<s> Despite a reputation of colonial unk many of the locally raised units were highly organised disciplined professional and well trained </s>
<s> During this period defences in Australia mainly revolved around static defence by combined infantry and artillery based on garrisoned coastal forts </s>
<s> However by the improved railway communications between the mainland eastern colonies led Major General James Edwards who had recently completed a survey of colonial military forces to the belief that the colonies could be defended by the rapid unk of brigades of infantry </s>
<s> As a consequence he called for a unk of defences and defensive agreements to be made between the colonies </s>
<s> Edwards argued for the colonial forces to be unk and for professional units obliged to serve anywhere in the South Pacific to replace the volunteer forces </s>
<s> These views found support in the influential New South Wales Commandant Major General Edward Hutton however suspicions held by the smaller colonies towards New South Wales and Victoria unk the proposal </s>
<s> These reforms remaining unresolved however and defence issues were generally given little attention in the debate on the political federation of the colonies </s>
<s> With the exception of Western Australia the colonies also operated their own navies </s>
<s> In Victoria received its own naval vessel unk Victoria and its deployment to New Zealand in during the First unk War marked the first occasion that an Australian warship had been deployed overseas </s>
<s> The colonial navies were expanded greatly in the mid and consisted of a number of gunboats and torpedo boats for the defence of harbours and rivers as well as naval brigades to man vessels and forts </s>
<s> Victoria became the most powerful of all the colonial navies with the ironclad unk Cerberus in service from as well as the steam sail warship HMS Nelson on loan from the Royal Navy three small gunboats and five torpedo boats </s>
<s> New South Wales formed a Naval Brigade in and by the start of the century had two small torpedo boats and a unk </s>
<s> The Queensland Maritime Defence Force was established in while South Australia operated a single ship HMCS Protector </s>
<s> Tasmania had also a small Torpedo Corps while Western Australia s only naval defences included the Fremantle Naval Artillery </s>
<s> Naval personnel from New South Wales and Victoria took part in the suppression of the unk Rebellion in China in while HMCS Protector was sent by South Australia but saw no action </s>
<s> The separate colonies maintained control over their military and naval forces until Federation in when they were amalgamated and placed under the control of the new Commonwealth of Australia </s>
<s> Sudan During the early years of the an Egyptian regime in the Sudan backed by the British came under threat from rebellion under the leadership of native Muhammad Ahmad or Ahmed known as Mahdi to his followers </s>

<s> Eventually the British government decided that the campaign in Sudan was not worth the effort required and left a garrison in unk </s>

<s> Second Boer War British encroachment into areas of South Africa already settled by the unk unk and the competition for resources and land that developed between them as a result led to the Second Boer War in </s>
<s> Pre unk the deployment of British forces the unk unk of the Orange Free State and the unk Republic under President Paul unk declared war on October striking deep into the British territories of Natal and the Cape Colony </s>
<s> After the outbreak of war plans for the dispatch of a combined Australian force were subsequently set aside by the British War Office and each of the six colonial governments sent separate unk to serve with British formations with two squadrons each of men from New South Wales and Victoria and one each from the other colonies </s>
<s> The first troops arrived three weeks later with the New South Wales unk who had been training in England before the war unk diverted to South Africa </s>

<s> With the guerrillas requiring supplies unk de la Rey lead a force of unk against unk on the unk River in Western unk </s>

<s> unk Rebellion The unk Rebellion in China began in and a number of western nations including many European powers the United States and Japan soon sent forces as part of the China Field Force to protect their interests </s>
<s> In June the British government sought permission from the Australian colonies to dispatch ships from the Australian Squadron to China </s>
<s> The colonies also offered to assist further but as most of their troops were still engaged in South Africa they had to rely on naval forces for manpower </s>
<s> The force dispatched was a modest one with Britain accepting men from Victoria from New South Wales and the South Australian ship HMCS Protector under the command of Captain William unk </s>
<s> Most of these forces were made up of naval brigade unk who had been trained in both ship handling and unk to fulfil their coastal defence role </s>
<s> Amongst the naval contingent from New South Wales were naval officers and sailors and permanent soldiers headquartered at Victoria Barracks Sydney who originally enlisted for the Second Boer War </s>

<s> Six Australians died from sickness and injury but none were killed as a result of enemy action </s>
<s> Australian military forces at Federation The Commonwealth of Australia came into existence on January as a result of the federation of the Australian colonies </s>
<s> Under the Constitution of Australia defence responsibility was now vested in the new federal government </s>
<s> The co ordination of Australia wide defensive efforts in the face of Imperial German interest in the Pacific Ocean was one of driving forces behind unk and the Department of Defence immediately came into being as a result while the Commonwealth Military Forces early forerunner of the Australian Army and Commonwealth Naval Force were also soon established </s>
<s> The Australian Commonwealth Military Forces came into being on March and all the colonial forces including those still in South Africa became part of the new force </s>
<s> unk colonial soldiers including professional soldiers paid militia and unk unpaid volunteers were subsequently transferred </s>
<s> The individual units continued to be administered under the various colonial Acts until the Defence Act brought all the units under one piece of legislation </s>
<s> This Act also prevented the raising of standing infantry units and specified that militia forces could not be used in industrial disputes or serve outside Australia </s>
<s> However the majority of soldiers remained in militia units known as the Citizen Military Forces unk </s>
<s> Major General Sir Edward Hutton a former commander of the New South Wales Military Forces subsequently became the first commander of the Commonwealth Military Forces on December and set to work unk an integrated structure for the new army </s>
<s> In following a report by Lord unk the Royal Military College unk was established as was a system of universal National Service </s>
<s> Prior to federation each self governing colony had operated its own naval force </s>
<s> These navies were small and lacked blue water capabilities forcing the separate colonies to unk the cost of a British naval squadron in their waters for decades </s>
<s> The colonies maintained control over their respective navies until March when the Commonwealth Naval Force was created </s>
<s> This new force also lacked blue water capable ships and ultimately did not lead to a change in Australian naval policy </s>
<s> In Prime Minister Alfred Deakin and unk while attending the Imperial Conference in London sought the British Government s agreement to end the subsidy system and develop an Australian navy </s>
<s> The Admiralty rejected and resented the challenge but suggested unk that a small fleet of destroyers and submarines would be sufficient </s>
<s> Deakin was unimpressed and in invited the American Great White Fleet to visit Australia </s>
<s> This visit fired public enthusiasm for a modern navy and in part led to the order of two ton River class destroyers </s>
<s> The surge in German naval construction prompted the Admiralty to change their position however and the Royal Australian Navy was subsequently formed in absorbing the Commonwealth Naval Force </s>
<s> On October the new fleet steamed through Sydney Heads consisting of the battlecruiser unk Australia three light cruisers and three destroyers while several other ships were still under construction </s>
<s> And as a consequence the navy entered the First World War as a formidable force </s>
<s> The Australian Flying Corps AFC was established as part of the Commonwealth Military Forces in prior to the formation of the Australian Military Forces in and was later separated in to form the Royal Australian Air Force making it the second oldest air force in the world </s>
<s> Regardless the service branches were not linked by a single chain of command however and each reported to their own minister and had separate administrative arrangements and government departments </s>
<s> First World War unk of hostilities When Britain declared war on Germany at the start of the First World War the Australian government rapidly followed suit with Prime Minister Joseph Cook declaring on August that when the Empire is at war so also is Australia and reflecting the sentiment of many Australians that any declaration of war by Britain automatically included Australia </s>
<s> This was itself in part due to the large number of British born citizens and first generation Anglo Australians that made up the Australian population at the time </s>
<s> Indeed by the end of the war almost of those who served in the Australian forces had been born in Britain </s>
<s> As the existing militia forces were unable to serve overseas under the provisions of the Defence Act an all volunteer expeditionary force known as the Australian Imperial Force AIF was formed and recruitment began on August </s>
<s> The government pledged men organised as one infantry division and one light horse brigade plus supporting units </s>
<s> unk and organisation was primarily regionally based and was undertaken under unk plans drawn up in </s>
<s> The first commander was Major General William Bridges who also assumed command of the Division </s>
<s> Throughout the course of the conflict Australian efforts were predominantly focused upon the ground war although small air and naval forces were also committed </s>
<s> Occupation of German New Guinea Following the outbreak of war Australian forces moved quickly to reduce the threat to shipping posed by the proximity of Germany s Pacific colonies </s>
<s> The Australian Naval and Military Expeditionary Force unk unk a man volunteer force separate from the AIF and consisting of an infantry battalion plus naval unk and ex sailors was rapidly formed under the command of William Holmes </s>
<s> The objectives of the force were the wireless stations on unk and those at Yap in the Caroline Islands and at Rabaul in German New Guinea </s>
<s> The force reached Rabaul on September and occupied it the next day encountering only brief resistance from the German and native defenders during fighting at unk unk and unk </s>
<s> German New Guinea surrendered on September </s>
<s> Australian losses were light including six killed during the fighting but were compounded by the mysterious loss offshore of the submarine unk with all men aboard </s>
<s> Gallipoli The AIF departed by ship in a single convoy from Albany on November </s>
<s> During the journey one of the convoy s naval escorts unk Sydney engaged and destroyed the German cruiser SMS unk at the Battle of unk on November in the first ship to ship action involving the Royal Australian Navy </s>
<s> Although originally bound for England to undergo further training and then for employment on the Western Front the Australians were instead sent to British controlled Egypt to pre unk any Turkish attack against the strategically important Suez Canal and with a view to opening another front against the Central Powers </s>
<s> unk to knock Turkey out of the war the British then decided to stage an amphibious unk at Gallipoli and following a period of training and reorganisation the Australians were included amongst the British Indian and French forces committed to the campaign </s>
<s> The combined Australian and New Zealand Army Corps ANZAC commanded by British general William Birdwood subsequently landed at Anzac Cove on the Gallipoli peninsula on April </s>
<s> Although promising to transform the war if successful the Gallipoli Campaign was ill conceived and ultimately lasted eight months of bloody stalemate without achieving its objectives </s>
<s> Australian casualties totalled including killed </s>
<s> For Australians and New Zealanders the Gallipoli campaign came to symbolise an important milestone in the emergence of both nations as independent actors on the world stage and the development of a sense of national identity </s>
<s> Today the date of the initial landings April is known as Anzac Day in Australia and New Zealand and every year thousands of people gather at memorials in both nations as well as Turkey to honour the bravery and sacrifice of the original unk and of all those who have subsequently lost their lives in war </s>
<s> Egypt and Palestine After the withdrawal from Gallipoli the Australians returned to Egypt and the AIF underwent a major expansion </s>
<s> In the infantry began to move to France while the cavalry units remained in the Middle East to fight the Turks </s>
<s> Australian troops of the Anzac Mounted Division and the Australian Mounted Division saw action in all the major battles of the Sinai and Palestine Campaign playing a pivotal role in fighting the Turkish troops that were threatening British control of Egypt </s>
<s> The Australian s first saw combat during the unk uprising in the unk Desert and the Nile Valley during which the combined British forces successfully put down the primitive pro Turkish Islamic sect with heavy casualties </s>
<s> The Anzac Mounted Division subsequently saw considerable action in the Battle of Romani against the Turkish between August with the Turks eventually pushed back </s>
<s> Following this victory the British forces went on the offensive in the Sinai although the pace of the advance was governed by the speed by which the railway and water pipeline could be constructed from the Suez Canal </s>

<s> Asia and the Pacific From the Australia s defence thinking was dominated by British Imperial defence policy which was embodied by the Singapore strategy </s>
<s> This strategy involved the construction and defence of a major naval base at Singapore from which a large British fleet would respond to Japanese aggression in the region </s>
<s> To this end a high proportion of Australian forces in Asia were concentrated in Malaya during and as the threat from Japan increased </s>
<s> However as a result of the emphasis on co operation with Britain relatively few Australian military units had been retained in Australia and the Asia Pacific region </s>

<s> Military and Naval growth during the At the start of the Prime Minister Robert unk greatly expanded the Australian military so that it could carry out the Government s policy of Forward Defence in South East Asia </s>

<s> Indonesia Malaysia unk The Indonesia Malaysia confrontation was fought from to between the British Commonwealth and Indonesia over the creation of the Federation of Malaysia with the Commonwealth attempting to safeguard the security of the new state </s>

<s> During the early phases British and Malaysian troops had attempted only to control the Malaysian Indonesian border and to protect population centres </s>

<s> Vietnam War Australia s involvement in the Vietnam War was driven largely by the rise of communism in Southeast Asia after the Second World War and the fear of its spread which developed in Australia during the and early </s>
<s> As a consequence Australia supported South Vietnam throughout the early </s>

<s> Post Vietnam era Creation of the Australian Defence Force Although the importance of joint warfare had been highlighted during Second World War when Australian naval ground and air units frequently served as part of single commands the absence of a central authority continued to result in poor co ordination between the services in the post war era with each organising and operating on the basis of a different military doctrine </s>
<s> The need for an integrated command structure received more emphasis during the Australian military s experiences in the Vietnam War </s>
<s> In the Secretary of the Department of Defence Arthur unk submitted a report to the Government that recommended the unification of the separate departments supporting each service into a single department and the creation of the post of Chief of the Defence Force Staff </s>
<s> The unk Labor Government subsequently amalgamated the five defence unk Defence Navy Army Air Force and Supply into a single Department of Defence in while conscription under the National Service scheme was abolished </s>
<s> On January the three branches of the Australian military were brought together as a unified all volunteer professional force known as the Australian Defence Force unk </s>

<s> Defence of Australia and Until the Australia s military strategy centred on the concept of Forward Defence in which the role of Australian military and naval forces were to co operate with Allied forces to counter threats in Australia s region </s>
<s> Following the adoption of the Guam Doctrine by the United States in and the British withdrawal east of Suez in the early Australia developed a defence policy emphasising self reliance and the defence of the Australian continent </s>
<s> Known as the Defence of Australia Policy it focused Australian defence planning on protecting the nation s northern maritime approaches the air sea gap against possible attack </s>
<s> In line with this goal the unk was unk to increase its ability to strike at enemy forces from Australian bases and to counter raids on continental Australia </s>
<s> This was achieved by increasing the capabilities of the unk and RAAF and relocating regular Army units to Northern Australia </s>
<s> During this time the unk had no military units on operational deployment outside Australia </s>
<s> However in the unk made its first operational deployment as part of Operation Morris Dance in which several warships and a rifle company deployed to the waters off Fiji in response to the unk coups d état </s>

<s> However these forces were gradually reduced with the infantry battalion withdrawn from Singapore in and the two unk fighter squadrons in </s>

<s> Military statistics Ward Churchill Ward unk Churchill born is an American author and political activist </s>
<s> He was a professor of ethnic studies at the University of Colorado Boulder from until </s>

<s> The News reported that both Churchill s birth parents were listed as white on the census as were all but two of his great great grandparents listed on previous census and other official documents </s>

<s> Numerous members of Churchill s extended family have longstanding family legends of Indian ancestry among ancestors but none was confirmed among the direct forebears of Churchill who were identified </s>
<s> unk in Churchill s university personnel file show that he was granted tenure in a special opportunity position </s>
<s> In then unk Boulder Chancellor James unk refused to take action on allegations that Churchill was unk claiming to be an Indian saying it has always been university policy that a person s race or ethnicity is self proving </s>
<s> Some of Churchill s Native American critics such as Vernon unk White Earth Ojibwe and unk unk unk Southern Cheyenne unk Creek argue that his assertion of Native American ancestry without the ability to prove it might constitute unk and grounds for termination </s>
<s> The University has said that it does not hire on the basis of ethnicity </s>
<s> The University of Colorado s Research unk Committee conducted a preliminary investigation into whether Churchill misrepresented his ethnicity to add credibility and public acceptance to his scholarship </s>
<s> The committee concluded that the allegation was not appropriate for further investigation under the definition of research unk </s>
<s> In a interview in The Rocky Mountain News Churchill said I have never been confirmed as having one quarter blood and never said I was </s>

<s> I have never claimed to be unk unk Bull </s>
<s> The longtime indigenous activist Russell unk said in February of that year So I want from this day forward every media person nationally internationally and locally to know that we have unk that Ward Churchill is a full unk Indian leader </s>
<s> Blood quantum Churchill has responded to requests for unk of his claimed Indian heritage in various ways including attacking the blood quantum upon which some Native American tribes establish their membership requirements </s>
<s> Churchill argues that the United States instituted blood quantum laws based upon rules of unk in order to further goals of personal unk and political unk </s>
<s> For decades in his writings Churchill has argued that blood quantum laws have an inherent unk purpose </s>
<s> He says Set the blood quantum at one quarter hold to it as a rigid definition of Indians let unk proceed as it has and eventually Indians will be defined out of existence </s>
<s> Churchill s unk have been raised as one of the several research unk allegations that were brought against him in see below </s>
<s> He has been accused of using his interpretation of the unk Act to attack tribal governments that would not recognize him as a member </s>
<s> Writing Churchill has written on American Indian history and culture and speaks about unk inflicted on the indigenous people of the Americas by European settlers and what he describes as the repression of native peoples that continues to this day </s>
<s> As of according to a report submitted on his behalf Churchill has written books on his own and co authored </s>
<s> Some have been reprinted with updates </s>
<s> He has written book chapters law reviews and scholarly essays of these were unk </s>

<s> According to the University of Colorado investigation His academic publications are nearly all works of synthesis and unk drawing upon studies by other scholars not unk describing new research based on primary sources </s>
<s> The investigation also noted that he has decided to publish largely in alternative presses or journals not in the university presses or mainstream peer reviewed journals often favored by more conventional academics </s>
<s> In addition to his academic writing Churchill has written for several general readership magazines of political opinion </s>
<s> In Churchill wrote an essay titled unk as unk Notes on an American unk criticizing pacifist politics within the US left as being unk de facto racist and unk </s>
<s> In unk Ring Publishing published the essay in a book entitled unk as unk Reflections on the Role of Armed unk in North America and listing Ward Churchill as the author </s>

<s> The book sparked much debate in leftist circles and inspired more aggressive tactics within the anti unk movement in the following few years </s>
<s> Agents of unk co authored by Jim unk Wall describes what the authors claim was a secret war against the Black Panther Party and American Indian Movement carried out during the late and by the FBI under the unk program </s>
<s> The unk unk reissued also co authored with Jim unk Wall examines a series of original FBI unk that detail the Bureau s activities against various leftist groups from the US Communist Party in the to activists concerned with Central American issues in the </s>
<s> In Fantasies of the Master Race Churchill examines the portrayal of American Indians and the use of American Indian symbols in popular American culture </s>
<s> He focuses on such phenomena as Tony unk s mystery novels the film unk with Wolves and the New Age movement finding examples of cultural imperialism and exploitation </s>

<s> Churchill s Indians Are Us </s>
<s> a sequel to Fantasies of the Master Race further explores American Indian issues in popular culture and politics </s>
<s> He examines the movie Black Robe the Pine Ridge Indian unk killings the prosecution of Leonard unk sports unk the Indian Arts and unk Act of and blood quantum laws calling them tools of unk </s>

<s> twists historical facts and is hostile toward Indian tribes </s>

<s> He compares the treatment of North American Indians to historical instances of unk by the Khmer Rouge in Cambodia Turks against unk and Europeans against the unk as well as Nazis against the Poles and Jews </s>

<s> unk the evolution of federal Indian law Churchill argues that the principles set forth were not only applied to non Indians in the US but later adapted for application abroad </s>
<s> He concludes that this demonstrates the development of the US s imperial logic which depends on a corrupt form of unk to establish colonial control and empire </s>
<s> Churchill s controversial essay on was expanded into a book length manuscript published as On the Justice of unk unk Reflections on the unk of US Imperial unk and unk by AK Press </s>

<s> In Kill the Indian Save the Man The unk Impact of American Indian Residential Schools Churchill traces the history of removing American Indian children from their homes to residential schools in Canada or Indian boarding schools in the USA as part of government policies which he regards as unk </s>
<s> unk on Native American issues Churchill has been active since at least as the co director of the Denver based American Indian Movement of Colorado now an autonomous chapter of the American Indian Movement </s>
<s> In he and other local unk leaders including Russell unk Glenn T Morris Robert unk and David Hill broke with the national unk leadership including Dennis Banks and the brothers Vernon and Clyde unk claiming that all unk chapters are autonomous </s>
<s> The unk Grand unk Council is based in Minneapolis and retains the name of the national group </s>
<s> It says that the schism arose when unk Churchill Glenn T Morris and others openly supported the unk Indian group unk who were allied with the anti revolutionary CIA backed unk </s>
<s> Journalists such as unk unk attributed the split to unk and other unk members dividing over opposition to the unk brothers because of their alleged involvement in the execution of Anna unk unk in December who was then the highest ranking woman in unk but had been suspected of being an informant </s>
<s> It was a year in which other FBI unk had been discovered in unk </s>
<s> On November unk held a press conference in Denver Colorado in which he accused the unk brothers of unk in unk s death and named three lower level unk members involved in her death unk Looking Cloud John Graham and unk Nelson Clark </s>
<s> This was the first time that an unk leader active at the time of the unk murder had publicly accused unk of having been involved </s>

<s> essay controversy Churchill wrote an essay in September entitled On the Justice of unk unk </s>
<s> In it he argued that the September attacks were provoked by US foreign policy </s>

<s> Research unk investigation The controversy attracted increased academic attention to Churchill s research which had already been criticized by the legal scholar John unk and historian unk unk </s>
<s> Additional critics were the sociologist Thomas Brown who had been preparing an article on Churchill s work and the historians unk Robertson and Russell unk who claimed that Churchill had misrepresented their work </s>
<s> In University of Colorado Boulder administrators ordered an investigation into seven allegations of research unk including three allegations of plagiarism and four allegations of fabrication or unk regarding the history of the unk Act the Indian Arts and unk Act of and statements that smallpox was intentionally spread to Native Americans by John Smith in unk and by the United States Army at Fort Clark in not to be confused with the well documented use of smallpox infected blankets at Fort Pitt in </s>
<s> On May the University released their findings the unk Committee agreed unanimously that Churchill had engaged in serious research unk including unk fabrication and two of the three allegations of plagiarism </s>
<s> The committee was divided on the appropriate level of sanctions </s>
<s> The Standing Committee on Research unk accepted the findings of the unk Committee but also disagreed on what sanctions should be imposed </s>
<s> Churchill s appeal against his proposed dismissal was considered by a panel of the University s unk and unk Committee which found that two of the seven findings of unk did not constitute unk offences </s>
<s> Three members recommended that the penalty should be demotion and one year s suspension without pay while two favored dismissal </s>
<s> On July the University unk voted seven to two to uphold all seven of the findings of research unk unk the recommendation of unk and unk panel that two be dismissed </s>
<s> By a vote of eight to one the unk determined to fire Churchill </s>
<s> The next day Churchill filed a lawsuit in state court claiming that the firing was unk for his expressing politically unpopular views </s>
<s> The jury in Churchill s suit for unk weighed the university s claims of academic unk per jury instructions it received in the case </s>

<s> The jury found that the alleged unk would not have led to Churchill s firing and rejected the university s academic unk claim as the grounds for dismissal </s>

<s> unk of the Denver District Court to order unk in light of the verdict </s>

<s> unk denied Churchill s request for unk at unk </s>

<s> unk Churchill s subjects are often American Indian figures and other themes associated with Native American Culture </s>

<s> Exit Through the unk E Mart Exit Through the unk E Mart is the fifteenth episode of the twenty third season of the American animated television sitcom The Simpsons </s>
<s> It originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on March </s>
<s> In the episode Bart is punished by Homer after causing trouble </s>
<s> He gets revenge on his father by unk painting images of him with the word unk all over Springfield </s>
<s> Street artist Shepard unk encounters Bart one night and offers him a gallery show of Bart s artworks </s>
<s> However Chief unk suddenly appears during the show and arrests Bart for covering the town in graffiti </s>
<s> It turns out that unk is an undercover officer working for unk </s>
<s> The episode references the street art documentary Exit Through the Gift Shop by graffiti artist unk and features guest appearances from street artists Ron English Kenny unk and Robbie unk as themselves </s>
<s> unk who is a long time fan of The Simpsons also guest starred in the episode as himself </s>
<s> Around </s>
<s> million Americans tuned in to watch Exit Through the unk E Mart during its original broadcast </s>
<s> Since then the episode has received praise from television critics for its opening sequence which parodies the opening sequence of the medieval fantasy television series Game of unk </s>
<s> Plot As a birthday gift for Marge Homer unk a unk designed by television chef Paula Paul </s>
<s> He goes to a health food store called unk Jack s where Paula is giving away unk to have Paula sign it </s>
<s> Homer is impressed by the store and says he will not be shopping at the unk E Mart any more </s>
<s> Apu who is there to spy unk Homer and the two engage in a fight until the security guards grab hold of Apu and take him away </s>
<s> At the signing Homer tells Paula that Marge is a big fan of hers </s>
<s> Paula decides that she will call Marge live during her upcoming show to wish her a happy birthday </s>
<s> Meanwhile Bart gets his mother a unk for her birthday </s>
<s> The unk unk through the phone lines in the Simpsons home causing Marge to miss Paula s call </s>
<s> Paula becomes furious at Marge for not answering the phone as she embarrassed herself on her show </s>
<s> Homer unk Bart by unk him up in the unk s cage </s>
<s> To get revenge on Homer Bart goes around Springfield unk painting graffiti of Homer s face and the word unk </s>
<s> When his work appears on the television news it encourages Bart to create even more graffiti in the town </s>
<s> Street artists Shepard unk Ron English Kenny unk and Robbie unk encounter Bart one night when he is making some graffiti </s>
<s> The four tell Bart that they are impressed by his work and would like to showcase his art in a gallery show at first Bart is unsure but Bart remembers how Homer treated him and then agrees </s>
<s> Meanwhile the unk E Mart suffers because of the competition from unk Jack s </s>
<s> Apu ends up attempting to unk unk Jack s in a desperate measure but the unk Snake unk convinces him to hand over the gun </s>
<s> Later Apu is about to shut down the unk E Mart when his wife unk tells him that unk Jack s is closing because it was discovered they were selling monkey meat imported from Brazil as chicken </s>
<s> Homer initially refuses to attend Bart s show because he discovers the artwork is an insult to him but changes his mind after Bart apologizes and writes I m sorry on the hood of Homer s car </s>
<s> At the show Chief unk and the Springfield Police Department suddenly appear to arrest Bart for making graffiti throughout the town </s>
<s> It is revealed that the gallery show is a unk and that unk is an undercover officer who helped the police identify Bart as the graffiti artist that had been unk painting Springfield </s>
<s> Since Bart is just a boy he is not sent to jail </s>
<s> Instead he is punished by once again being locked up in the unk cage </s>
<s> When Bart tells unk that he has to go to the bathroom unk covers the cage with the blanket and finds Bart gone when he removes the blanket from the cage </s>
<s> Production Exit Through the unk E Mart was written by Marc unk and directed by Steven Dean Moore as part of the twenty third season of The Simpsons </s>
<s> It unk the debated status of street art as a true form of art </s>
<s> The title is a reference to Exit Through the Gift Shop a street art documentary by graffiti artist unk who produced the opening sequence of an earlier Simpsons episode titled unk </s>
<s> The Richard unk song Tonight The Streets Are unk which is the theme song of Exit Through the Gift Shop is included in the episode during a montage of Bart painting graffiti in Springfield </s>
<s> unk Childs of The AV </s>
<s> Club noted in his review of Exit Through the unk E Mart that the reveal that the art show was a police unk gives the show a moment to joke about the anti art market theme from Exit Through The Gift Shop </s>
<s> unk asks who would be stupid enough to pay for work that an amateur puts up for free in public and the answer is as in unk s movie the very wealthy here represented by Mr Burns </s>
<s> American street artist unk guest starred in Exit Through the unk E Mart as himself </s>
<s> The graffiti art featuring Homer s face and the word unk that Bart creates in the episode is a reference to unk s Barack Obama Hope poster and his unk Giant image </s>
<s> unk has said that The Simpsons has been one of his favorite television shows since the early because of its blend of humor and social commentary and he felt deeply honored to be included in an episode </s>
<s> unk wrote on his website that Part of being on The Simpsons is you re being honored as a reference point in culture </s>
<s> He described the plot of the episode as great adding that the staff members of the show were kind enough to indulge a couple of my dialogue suggestions designed to make the social commentary more pointed even though I had to make fun of myself to do so </s>
<s> This was unk s first acting performance </s>

<s> The Boat Race The unk Boat Race took place on March </s>
<s> Held annually the event is a side by side rowing race between crews from the Universities of Oxford and Cambridge along the River Thames </s>
<s> Oxford won the race </s>
<s> Oxford s crew featured the oldest competitor in Boat Race history </s>
<s> The race took place in very difficult weather conditions strong winds and heavy rain resulting in the slowest winning time in over sixty years </s>
<s> Oxford won by six lengths the largest margin of victory since the race </s>
<s> Oxford s Isis beat Cambridge s Goldie in the reserve race while Oxford won the Women s Boat Race </s>
<s> Background The Boat Race is a side by side rowing competition between the University of Oxford sometimes referred to as the Dark Blues and the University of Cambridge sometimes referred to as the Light Blues </s>
<s> First held in the race takes place on the </s>
<s> mile </s>
<s> km Championship Course on the River Thames in southwest London </s>
<s> The rivalry is a major point of honour between the two universities and followed throughout the United Kingdom and broadcast worldwide </s>
<s> Cambridge went into the race as reigning champions having beaten Oxford by over a length in the previous year s race and the overall lead with victories to Oxford s </s>
<s> The race was sponsored by unk for the fourth time </s>

<s> The reserve race contested between Oxford s Isis boat and Cambridge s Goldie boat has been held since </s>
<s> It usually takes place on the unk prior to the main Boat Race </s>

<s> kg more per rower than their opponents and featured the oldest competitor in Boat Race history in year old American Mike unk </s>

<s> Fort Scott National Historic Site Fort Scott National Historic Site is a historical area under the control of the United States National Park Service in Bourbon County Kansas United States </s>
<s> Named after General Winfield Scott who achieved unk during the Mexican American War during the middle of the century the fort served as a military base for US Army action in what was the edge of settlement in </s>
<s> For the next quarter century it was used as a supply base and to provide security in turbulent areas during the opening of the West to settlement a period which included Bleeding Kansas and the American Civil War </s>
<s> The current national historic site protects historic structures a parade ground and five acres m of restored unk prairie inside the city of Fort Scott </s>
<s> It is open to visitors most days of the year </s>
<s> History In Fort Scott was named after Winfield Scott was established on the American frontier on the military road in eastern Kansas between Fort unk and Fort Gibson </s>
<s> It was established to provide protection to the rapidly increasing number of settlers who were migrating from the Eastern United States </s>
<s> Fort Scott became one of a chain of forts intended to protect the new settlers from the Plains Indians as well as to protect the Indians from the settlers encroachment </s>
<s> The United States government intention to reserve permanent Indian lands west of the Missouri River gave way to the competition of settlers continuing to unk on the Indian settlements </s>
<s> Fort Scott s most active days were between and although it was also used during the Civil War </s>
<s> Army days The unk of Indian Territory now Oklahoma were upset to have Fort Wayne in their proximity </s>
<s> After some delay the US Army decided to abandon Fort Wayne and move its soldiers to a new fort to be built between Fort unk and the site </s>
<s> The Army both wanted to unk the unk who were supervised by the Department of Defense and provide more defense for white settlers and other Indians against the Osage who had been conducting frequent raids in the area </s>
<s> On April some soldiers of Fort Wayne left their fort and on April arrived where Fort Scott would be built in the Osage unk section of modern day Kansas </s>
<s> After unk with the unk to acquire the land the rest of Fort Wayne s garrison left the fort on May and arrived at the Fort Scott site on May </s>
<s> Unlike most forts for military use the fort did not have defensive walls or structures when first built the wide open area and the available artillery made an enclosed fort unnecessary </s>
<s> The soldiers concentrated on building structures for lodging the men animals and equipment </s>
<s> These buildings were on the edges of a foot m parade ground </s>
<s> The post unk Captain Thomas Swords was in charge of building Fort Scott s structures and had to deal with the problems of construction on the Kansas prairie which had few trees </s>
<s> He had only two unk and three carpenters to rely on as there were few civilians and most of the soldiers had other duties to perform </s>
<s> Wood was available but the mill was built </s>
<s> miles </s>
<s> km away making transport time consuming </s>
<s> Swords found his efforts plagued by lack of wood skilled labor and working equipment </s>
<s> Freak accidents destroyed much of the wood intended for the fort s construction </s>
<s> As a result only one unk of the five planned officers quarters four unk and post commandant s house was built by and the intended enlisted barracks were not completed </s>
<s> In his inspection of the fort Colonel George unk reported that in comparison to other frontier forts he considered Fort Scott above average </s>
<s> Due to the rising tensions that escalated in the Mexican American War the US Army redeployed troops to the Southwest </s>
<s> With Fort Scott still uncompleted officials decided on April that no more construction would be done there after eight years and </s>
<s> By the time it was finished it was obsolete three years later it was abandoned by the military in favor of the more western Fort Riley </s>
<s> For the average soldier life at the fort was unk </s>
<s> Until the permanent structures were built soldiers had to live in tents which lacked comfort </s>
<s> Aside from a few whiskey unk and prostitutes few civilians lived at the fort </s>
<s> Officers had brought their personal slaves with them including Captain Swords </s>
<s> Five miles East in Missouri was a unk shop that supplied soldiers and quite a few courts martial followed soldiers going unk at the shop </s>
<s> The unk rate from the fort ranged from unk due to boredom irregular pay and hatred for military life </s>
<s> As no combat took place near the fort it seemed more of a frontier village than a military base </s>
<s> Hunting was a popular unk according to Captain Swords wolf chasing and duck hunting was the only way one officer could tolerate the place </s>
<s> Bleeding Kansas Two years after the army abandoned the fort the buildings were sold by auction to civilians with two being converted to hotels </s>
<s> In the Kansas Nebraska Act repealed the Missouri unk of which had kept slavery out of Kansas </s>
<s> unk in favor of slavery soon moved to Kansas to try to sway the vote of whether or not Kansas would permit slavery </s>
<s> Settlers from New England arrived equally determined to keep it out </s>
<s> Each of the two competing factions of the Bleeding Kansas conflict claimed one of the hotels at Fort Scott Free Soil at the Fort Scott Hotel and Pro unk at the Western Hotel </s>
<s> Most of the residents in Fort Scott supported slavery but those outside the town tended to the free soil side </s>
<s> During this time there were local incidents of murder and attempted unk typical elements of the guerrilla conflicts that were prevalent in the fighting </s>
<s> Army returns During the American Civil War the fort was renewed as a US military post </s>
<s> In August the Union Army took command of Fort Scott and unk it for the war times </s>
<s> The United States Army also took over several blocks within the town for unk and unk functions </s>
<s> The Union Army rented the properties from the current civilian owners </s>
<s> Troops from Indiana Iowa Colorado Ohio and Wisconsin would come to the fort and either stayed by the fort or traveled farther to unk Missouri Arkansas or the Indian Territory </s>
<s> Fort Scott was one of the few installations that recruited and trained black soldiers for the United States unk Troops of the Union Army </s>
<s> A major supply depot was situated at the fort </s>
<s> Confederate general Sterling Price hoped to capture the town but the closest the Confederate force came to the garrison was miles km away at Battle of Dry Wood Creek </s>
<s> The site was strategically important as it was within a Southern unk area and close to the Confederate state of Arkansas and the unstable Indian Territory present day state of Oklahoma where many of the members of the Five unk unk were allied with the Confederates </s>
<s> The fort served as a general hospital large military hospital and prison until after the war </s>
<s> Following the end of the war in October the US Army left the facilities and sold off by auction what they controlled </s>
<s> On January the Army returned with the formation of the Post of Southeast Kansas </s>
<s> The Post was based at Fort Scott but the soldiers camped along the rail tracks and seldom used the original fort </s>
<s> They were sent to protect the railroads and workers from settlers </s>
<s> Some of the latter feared that the railroad which had been awarded land for development by the US Government in rights of way would evict them from their unk homes </s>
<s> The settlers considered the troops unk to the railroads and unk both as enemies </s>
<s> Settlers also had some continuing conflicts with Indians and insurgents using the recent Confederate cause as excuse for robbery </s>
<s> By the spring of the US Army withdrew the troops from Fort Scott for good </s>
<s> From to the buildings of the fort were left unk and slowly deteriorated </s>
<s> Many military buildings were razed and replaced with structures built for civilian use </s>
<s> Modern times With the Act of August the National Park Service gave the city government of Fort Scott Kansas the necessary funds and technical knowledge to restore the fort </s>
<s> On October Fort Scott became a National Historic Site under the supervision of the National Park Service encompassing acres </s>
<s> Today the fort is open throughout the year save for unk Christmas and New Years Day </s>
<s> unk has declined in recent years </s>
<s> In visitation was unk in it was </s>
<s> Surviving structures include four officers barracks one unk s barracks two infantry barracks a hospital unk unk unk ordnance and post headquarters unk unk unk shop flagpole and magazine </s>
<s> Another feature of the park is acres </s>
<s> ha of unk prairie restored as part of an ecology restoration project </s>

<s> Results King of the Mountain match Home Made unk Pie Home Made unk Pie is a American silent short comedy produced by the Thanhouser Company </s>

<s> Back Off unk Back Off unk is a song by English musician unk Starr released as a non album single in March </s>
<s> Starr s former Beatles unk George Harrison produced the recording which took place in London shortly after the two had appeared together at Harrison s Concert for Bangladesh shows in August </s>
<s> The single was a follow up to Starr s hit song It Don t Come Easy and continued his successful run as a solo artist </s>
<s> Back Off unk peaked at number in Britain and Canada and number on America s Billboard Hot </s>
<s> It remains Starr s highest charting single in the United Kingdom </s>
<s> The title for the song was inspired by English singer songwriter Marc unk </s>
<s> Some commentators have suggested that the lyrics were directed at Paul McCartney reflecting Starr s disdain for the music McCartney had made as a solo artist over the previous two years </s>
<s> Back Off unk demonstrates the influence of unk rock on Starr who directed a documentary film Born to Boogie about unk s band T Rex around this time </s>
<s> Described by one author as a high energy in your face rocker the song features a prominent slide guitar part by Harrison and contributions from musicians Gary Wright and Klaus unk </s>
<s> Starr re recorded Back Off unk for his album Stop and unk the Roses in a collaboration with American singer Harry Nilsson that incorporates lyrics from Beatles songs such as With a Little Help from My Friends Good Day Sunshine and Baby You re a Rich Man </s>
<s> The original version has appeared on Starr s compilation albums unk from Your Past and unk The Very Best of unk Starr and as a bonus track on his remastered studio album unk Vienna </s>
<s> Since his return to touring in Starr has performed Back Off unk regularly in concert with the various unk of his All Starr Band </s>
<s> Background and composition unk Starr identified his initial inspiration for Back Off unk as having come from Marc unk the singer and guitarist with English unk rock band T Rex </s>
<s> In a interview with unk editor Paul Du unk Starr described unk as a dear friend who used to come into the office when I was running Apple Movies a big office in town and the hang out for myself Harry Nilsson and Keith Moon </s>
<s> Over dinner one evening at Starr s home outside London unk had used the word unk so often that it stuck in Starr s mind after which the beat and melody for the song came to him overnight </s>
<s> When discussing the composition on unk in May Starr explained unk was an unk guy </s>
<s> He used to speak Back off unk unk you unk </s>
<s> Do you want some potatoes </s>
<s> unk you unk </s>
<s> Starr also recalled having to take the batteries out of his children s toys that night in order to power a tape recorder and make a recording of the new song </s>
<s> The lyrics to the middle eight of Back Off unk came to Starr while watching London Weekend Television s football show The Big Match </s>
<s> The program s host Jimmy Hill often referred to a footballer s playing as unk a catchphrase that Starr incorporated into his song lyrics Get yourself together now And give me something unk Everything you try to do You know it sure sounds wasted </s>
<s> Commentators have interpreted the song and particularly this statement as an attack by Starr on his former Beatles unk Paul McCartney </s>
<s> Starr has denied any such interpretation instead claiming that the song was inspired by unk and nothing more Beatles biographer Robert Rodriguez writes </s>
<s> Starr had publicly criticised McCartney s solo albums McCartney and Ram on release and author Bruce unk unk the message of the middle eight as a plea for Paul to produce better music </s>
<s> The mention of sound ing wasted could also be a reference to McCartney s unk with cannabis Rodriguez suggests </s>
<s> A further example of Starr s allegedly anti McCartney message exists in the song s first verse Wake up unk Don t pretend that you are dead Get yourself up off the cart </s>
<s> The same commentators suggest that here Starr could be referring to the Paul Is Dead hoax </s>
<s> The latter unk circulated during September and October of that year while McCartney hid away on his Scottish farm unk after John Lennon had told him and Starr that he wanted a divorce from the Beatles </s>
<s> In addition to these supposed messages in Back Off unk observers have viewed the song title as Starr s unk to McCartney to abandon his legal stand against the Beatles and Apple Corps which was placed in receivership in March after a High Court judge found in McCartney s favour </s>
<s> Author Keith unk writes that unk had long been cited as Paul s nickname from his former bandmates Starr Lennon and George Harrison </s>
<s> While acknowledging that in subsequent years Starr might have chosen to minimise any ill feeling towards McCartney Rodriguez notes that the lyrics just happened to fit perfectly into the us vs Paul mindset following the Beatles break up to the extent that Back Off unk was as unk as Early had been unk </s>
<s> When unk his composition I m the Greatest for Starr to record on the album unk Lennon referenced the song title with the lines Now I m only thirty two And all I want to do is unk </s>
<s> Although T Rex devotees in the words of Starr biographer Alan unk claimed that unk had ghost written Back Off unk Starr later acknowledged that Harrison co wrote the song by adding some chords and finishing the melody </s>
<s> As on Starr s hit single It Don t Come Easy Harrison was not credited for his songwriting contribution </s>
<s> Starr originally offered Back Off unk to fellow unk unk Black to record but she declined hoping instead to record another new Starr Harrison composition unk </s>
<s> Recording Having earmarked the song as his next single Starr recorded Back Off unk in September following his appearance at the Harrison organised Concert for Bangladesh in New York </s>
<s> The sessions took place at Apple Studio in central London with Harrison producing as he had on It Don t Come Easy </s>
<s> The recording reflects the influence of unk rock on Starr through what authors unk unk and Mark Easter term its big drum sound and unk nature with a line up comprising Starr vocals drums percussion Harrison guitars Gary Wright piano and Klaus unk bass saxophone </s>
<s> Rodriguez describes Starr s martial sounding opening as a rare showcase for his own drumming while Harrison biographer Simon unk writes of a unk series of Harrison slide breaks that brought to mind unk unk </s>

<s> With Back Off unk NME critic Bob unk noted Starr s success in establishing himself in the two years since the Beatles break up and wrote that the single confirmed that he and Harrison dark horses both were the ones who had managed their solo careers more purposefully and unk compared with McCartney and Lennon </s>

<s> Among unk biographers Simon unk terms it a rocking soccer crowd chant that suited Starr s talents well and Bruce unk praises the track as a high energy in your face rocker propelled by unk s unk drums and George s unk slide guitar </s>

<s> Starr taped the basic track at unk Recording Studios in Los Angeles on November with additional recording taking place on December at Nassau s unk Point Studios </s>

<s> Personnel The following musicians played on the original version of Back Off unk unk Starr vocals drums percussion backing vocals George Harrison slide guitars acoustic guitar Gary Wright piano Klaus unk bass saxophone Madeline Bell unk Duncan Jean Gilbert backing vocals Chart performance Where the Streets Have No Name Where the Streets Have No Name is a song by Irish rock band </s>
<s> It is the opening track from their album The Joshua Tree and was released as the album s third single in August </s>
<s> The song s hook is a repeating guitar unk using a delay effect played during the song s introduction and again at the end </s>
<s> Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is possible to identify a person s religion and income based on the street on which they lived particularly in Belfast </s>
<s> During the band s difficulties recording the song producer Brian Eno considered unk the song s tapes to have them start from scratch </s>
<s> Where the Streets Have No Name was praised by critics and became a commercial success peaking at number thirteen in the US number fourteen in Canada number ten in the Netherlands and number four in the United Kingdom </s>
<s> The song has remained a staple of their live act since the song debuted in on The Joshua Tree Tour </s>
<s> The song was performed on a Los Angeles unk for the filming of its music video which won a Grammy Award for Best Performance Music Video </s>
<s> Writing and recording The music for Where the Streets Have No Name originated from a demo that guitarist The Edge composed the night before the group resumed The Joshua Tree sessions </s>
<s> In an upstairs room at unk House his newly purchased home The Edge used a four track tape machine to record an arrangement of keyboards bass guitar and a drum machine </s>
<s> unk that the album sessions were approaching the end and that the band were short on exceptional live songs The Edge wanted to unk up the ultimate live song so he imagined what he would like to hear at a future show if he were a fan </s>
<s> After finishing the rough mix he felt he had come up with the most amazing guitar part and song of his life </s>
<s> With no one in the house to share the demo with The Edge recalls dancing around and punching the air in celebration </s>
<s> Although the band liked the demo it was difficult for them to record the song </s>
<s> unk Adam Clayton said At the time it sounded like a foreign language whereas now we understand how it works </s>
<s> The arrangement with two time signature shifts and frequent chord changes was unk many times but the group struggled to get a performance they liked </s>
<s> According to co producer Daniel Lanois that was the science project song </s>
<s> I remember having this massive schoolhouse unk as we call them </s>
<s> I was holding a pointer like a college professor walking the band through the chord changes like a fucking unk </s>
<s> It was ridiculous </s>
<s> Co producer Brian Eno estimates that half of the album sessions were spent trying to record a suitable version of Where the Streets Have No Name </s>
<s> The band worked on a single take for weeks but as Eno explained that particular version had a lot of problems with it and the group continued trying to fix it up </s>
<s> Through all of their work they had gradually replaced each instrument take until nothing remained from the original performance </s>
<s> So much time had been spent on unk work that Eno thought it would be best to start from scratch </s>
<s> His idea was to stage an accident and have the song s tapes erased </s>
<s> He said that this was not to force abandonment of the song but rather that it would be more effective to start again with a fresh performance </s>
<s> At one point Eno had the tapes unk up and ready to be recorded over but this unk never took place according to engineer Flood fellow engineer Pat McCarthy returned to the control room and upon seeing Eno ready to erase the tapes dropped the unk of tea he was carrying and physically restrained Eno </s>
<s> The studio version of the song was compiled from several different takes </s>
<s> It was one of several songs mixed by Steve unk in the final months of recording The Joshua Tree </s>
<s> Drummer Larry Mullen Jr later said of the song It took so long to get that song right it was difficult for us to make any sense of it </s>
<s> It only became a truly great song through playing live </s>
<s> On the record musically it s not half the song it is live </s>
<s> Composition Where the Streets Have No Name is played at a tempo of beats per minute </s>
<s> The introduction and unk are played in a time signature while the remainder of the song is in a common signature </s>
<s> The songs opens with an instrumental section starting with unk like sustained unk notes </s>
<s> The guitar fades in after seconds this part consists of a repeated unk six note unk </s>
<s> A dotted eighth delay effect is used to play each note in the unk twice thus creating a rich sound </s>
<s> The bass and drums enter at </s>
<s> The introduction following a I IV I IV vi V I chord progression creates a wall of sound as described by Mark Butler against which the vocals emerge after nearly two minutes </s>
<s> The guitar part played for the remainder of the song features The Edge strumming unk sixteenth notes </s>
<s> The bass and drums continue in regular eighth and sixteenth notes respectively while Bono s vocal performance in contrast varies greatly in its unk he unk he unk he unk he unk unk he allows his voice to crack as well as timing by his usage of unk to slightly offset the notes he sings from the beat </s>
<s> This development reaches a climax during the first chorus at the line burning down love A G F D the melody progresses through a series of scale degrees that lead to the highest note in the song the unk at burning </s>
<s> In later choruses Bono sings blown by the wind with the same melody stretching the same note even longer </s>
<s> After the third chorus the song s unk is played the instrumentation reverting to the same state as it was in the introduction with a six note guitar unk played against sustained unk notes </s>
<s> Lyrics The lyrics were inspired by a story that Bono heard about the streets of Belfast Northern Ireland where a person s religion and income are evident by the street they live on </s>
<s> He contrasted this with the unk he felt when visiting Ethiopia saying the guy in the song recognizes this contrast and thinks about a world where there aren t such divisions a place where the streets have no name </s>
<s> To me that s the way a great rock n roll concert should be a place where everyone comes together Maybe that s the dream of all art to break down the barriers and the divisions between people and touch upon the things that matter the most to us all </s>
<s> Bono wrote the lyrics while on a humanitarian visit to Ethiopia with his wife Ali Hewson he first wrote them down on an unk bag while staying in a village </s>

<s> unk unk unk unk is a American black comedy film directed by Seth Gordon written by Michael unk John Francis unk and Jonathan Goldstein based on a story by unk </s>

<s> unk unk to assassinate a United States Attorney unk and other charges testified in assassination case Die Another Day Die Another Day is the twentieth spy film in the James Bond series and the fourth and final film to star Pierce unk as the fictional agent James Bond </s>

<s> unk unk unk unk unk born May is a Welsh actress best known for her role as unk Tyson in the BBC medical drama unk City </s>
<s> She first rose to prominence in the lead role of the unk unk screenplay Great unk in Aviation </s>
<s> unk has worked in theatre film and television appearing in a number of Shakespearean theatrical performances Hollywood films The i Inside and unk and British television shows including Soldier Soldier unk Sea of unk and Doctor Who </s>
<s> She appeared in unk City from its eighth to eleventh series from to and in starred in the unk musical comedy My Almost Famous Family </s>
<s> unk is an advocate of increased ethnic representation in the entertainment industry and in founded her own production company producing the short film unk s unk for the Cannes film festival in order to further her campaign </s>
<s> In unk was shortlisted for the Female Performance in TV award in the Screen Nation Awards receiving Honourable Mention in the same category in and a further shortlisted nomination in </s>
<s> She is married to fellow actor Adam unk with whom she has two daughters </s>
<s> Early life unk was born in Cardiff Wales in May to a Sierra unk mother and a unk father </s>
<s> She was raised by her mother s cousin and his wife in Ely Cardiff </s>
<s> unk s heritage means she is unk by descent although she does not speak the language </s>
<s> unk studied at Windsor Clive Primary and unk Ely High School and was a member of the unk Youth Theatre South Glamorgan Youth Theatre South Glamorgan Youth Choir and the National Youth Theatre of Wales </s>
<s> She left high school before sitting her A Levels in order to pursue her ambition of becoming an actress </s>
<s> She explains I ve always wanted to act </s>
<s> I decided at I wanted to make my living acting but even if I couldn t I d be in an amateur theatre company </s>
<s> She then went on to attend the Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama studying for a three year acting unk </s>
<s> Her first acting role was for the Welsh unk when still at primary school playing a lady in waiting at the court of King Arthur </s>
<s> unk has stated that it was unk Streisand s performance in unk unk </s>
<s> that inspired her to act as a child though credits her adoptive mother with encouraging her to act professionally </s>
<s> unk s first job was selling unk on unk Road Market in Cardiff </s>
<s> She worked as a unk whilst attending drama school and six weeks prior to graduation was offered a job with the Made in Wales theatre company which enabled her to obtain her union card </s>
<s> Career unk began her career in the theatre performing in a number of Shakespearean plays including Twelfth Night A Midsummer Night s Dream The Tempest The unk of Venice and Macbeth </s>
<s> She states of this Shakespeare keeps coming my way </s>
<s> I love the fact that I get to play people who are much more articulate than I ll ever be </s>
<s> unk has performed in Twelfth Night in the lead roles of both Olivia and Viola </s>
<s> She explains The role of Viola didn t sit that well with me for some reason but Olivia makes more sense </s>
<s> She has also appeared in modern performances assuming the title role of unk Queen of unk at the Globe Theatre in London in which she described as a dream of a part </s>
<s> She has deemed her dream role to be that of Isabella in Measure for Measure as she once lost out on the part and would like to prove herself capable of playing it </s>
<s> unk s first film appearance was in the film Great unk in Aviation written by unk unk in which she starred alongside Jonathan Pryce and John Hurt </s>
<s> Variety magazine s David unk said of her performance In the film s most unk turn unk is a constant pleasure to watch </s>
<s> unk and appealing she often succeeds in pulling the unk fireworks momentarily back down to Earth </s>
<s> unk recalls having been unk at the prospect of working alongside so many established names but has deemed it to have been a wonderful experience </s>
<s> Her subsequent film credits are romantic comedy The Secret unk of Women set in Nigeria and starring Colin Firth thriller The i Inside filmed in Sully Hospital Cardiff and starring Ryan unk and unk filmed in Morocco whilst unk was pregnant with her first child starring unk Cruz </s>
<s> unk says of her film career I really like doing film but I ve not done enough big films though to really know the difference between film and television </s>
<s> unk s first prolific television role was in the ITV drama Soldier Soldier in which she starred throughout its third series in as soldier s wife Bernie Roberts </s>
<s> unk credits her chemistry with co star unk unk who played her on screen husband Luke Roberts for winning her her audition </s>
<s> She went on to appear in Gone With the Wind sequel Scarlett and star in Welsh soap opera Tiger Bay </s>
<s> She has spoken critically of the way the BBC treated the soap moving it around the schedules and declining to commission a second series </s>
<s> She acted alongside Pauline unk in both unk unk and Being April deeming unk to be a fantastic actress and one she would work alongside again like a shot </s>
<s> In unk appeared at the National Theatre in Helen unk s adaptation of Leo unk s War and Peace </s>
<s> In she became a presenter of the BBC Wales arts programme Double Yellow alongside poet Owen unk and performance artist Mark Rees </s>
<s> She posed nude but for a pair of yellow rubber gloves to promote the show s launch and was highly critical of the BBC when the show was cancelled midway through its second series </s>
<s> She has since concluded that the kind of audience they would like to bring in with shows like Double Yellow aren t really into watching TV but at the time was outspoken against the show s cancellation stating unk s other notable television appearances include the BBC psychological thriller Green Eyed Monster soap opera unk Waking the Dead London s Burning unk Murder in Mind The Canterbury Tales and Sea of unk </s>
<s> In she starred in the Doctor Who episode Midnight playing an unk unk alongside David Tennant s Tenth Doctor </s>
<s> In unk starred in the unk musical comedy My Almost Famous Family </s>
<s> She stated The script made me laugh out loud when I read it </s>
<s> I also like the fact that there were a lot of politically correct boxes being unk but the writers and producer haven t been restrained by that </s>
<s> So instead of unk to this altar they ve said Okay we have this family that s half black half white half American half British </s>
<s> We have a mix of boys and girls one character who s mixed raced and unk but we re not going to be restrained by any of that </s>
<s> We re not going to unk around Martha s disability or anything </s>
<s> I liked that </s>
<s> It wasn t some sort of unk hands off approach to what we re presenting </s>
<s> She has also been cast in the film unk </s>
<s> unk City From February to December unk starred in BBC medical drama unk City as nurse unk Tyson </s>
<s> She had previously appeared in unk City s sister show unk and had made an appearance in unk City s fifth series as patient unk Lawson </s>
<s> She was approached about returning to the show in a more permanent role by BBC casting director Julie unk </s>
<s> After a series of three meetings a year after the birth of her first child she agreed to assume the role of unk despite being nervous about signing such a long contract stating I ve been someone who s loved the uncertainty of acting </s>
<s> I ve loved that one month it s unk in Morocco and the next I m doing a stage play then it s a six part unk thing </s>
<s> But last summer I started thinking it would be really nice not to have to look for a job every couple of weeks </s>
<s> It would be nice just to stay put for a while </s>
<s> If I m going to be a working mum I d rather just be one rather than be one intermittently </s>
<s> And then unk came along so I m very grateful </s>
<s> unk signed a three year contract to play unk and described herself as very similar to her character speaking positively about her working relationship with co stars Jaye unk and Sharon D Clarke as well as the dream storylines her character was given </s>
<s> She said of the show I really love unk and I m surprised how much </s>
<s> What thrills me about unk is that you get back what you put in </s>
<s> The powers that be are only as interested in you as they think you are in the job </s>
<s> For me it s about more than turning up and saying the lines </s>
<s> It s about understanding it and trying to make it better </s>
<s> That s actually a lot of fun </s>
<s> What s great is nobody says Just shut up </s>
<s> They want you to work at it </s>
<s> I surprise myself sometimes because after two and a half years sometimes I see friends on the side of a poster and I think do I want to do something else </s>
<s> but I really like this job I never get that awful unk feeling when you really don t want to go into work </s>
<s> In October unk announced that she would be departing from unk City in order to have a second child stating I ve had a great time and I ll miss it </s>
<s> I made the decision purely because I was pregnant but I wasn t really ready to put down the character of unk </s>
<s> I m very sorry to have to let her go </s>
<s> Race and charity work Throughout her career unk has been outspoken on the subject of racial discrimination in the entertainment industry </s>
<s> Describing her motivation she states I am not an overtly political person </s>
<s> I just want fairness </s>
<s> unk believes that black actors receive less recognition than their white counterparts explaining If you get a show with six stars and one is black you are more likely to see interviews with the five white actors </s>
<s> They are not being sold as a reason to watch </s>
<s> She believes that her career would have taken her in a different direction were she not of ethnic origin stating I could not have played any of the roles I have played on TV if I was white I am very aware of where the glass ceiling is and it s still very low and expectations are still very low </s>
<s> She has noted having casting directors accept the notion of characters being both black and Welsh to be a particular problem explaining that I get offered a lot of very different roles but they re never Welsh </s>
<s> The one time I was asked to play a Welsh character on screen was in Tiger Bay for BBC Wales but I know if that series had been called unk Park or unk Close I wouldn t have been in it </s>
<s> In unk founded a production company and directed a short film entitled unk s unk </s>
<s> She presented the film at the Cannes film festival using it as part of her campaign for increased black representation in theatre films and television </s>
<s> The project however was largely unsuccessful with unk stating it just made me decide that if there s anything I don t want to do it s produce films because I m rubbish at it </s>
<s> I was so bad with the budget that I just said yes to everything and then had to worry about how to pay for things at the end </s>
<s> In unk offered her support to the Action for Southern Africa campaign unk </s>
<s> Period aiming to provide affordable unk protection to unk women </s>
<s> Awards unk was nominated and shortlisted for the Female Performance in TV award in the Screen Nation Awards for her role as unk Tyson in unk City </s>
<s> She received Honourable Mention for the same role the following year and was shortlisted again in </s>
<s> In unk voted unk the unk woman in Wales saying of her One of our favourite unk she s black beautiful and the term unk mummy should have been made for her </s>
<s> She placed in with the Western Mail noting the last years have only seen unk become more beautiful and more successful </s>
<s> unk placed in the awards in </s>
<s> Personal life unk describes herself as optimistic cynical lazy naive and honest </s>
<s> She spends her free time watching television the theatre cinema concerts indoor wall climbing and keeping fit with unk and aerobics </s>
<s> She has a collection of unk dolls which she keeps under her bath </s>
<s> unk has an interest in travel and has visited Peru and Kenya among other destinations </s>
<s> She has expressed a desire to visit Brazil and Argentina and has a romantic notion of travelling around Europe in a unk van </s>
<s> unk often speaks of her pride in her Welsh upbringing describing herself as an Ely girl through and through </s>
<s> She was made a Fellow of the Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama in </s>
<s> During a production of Hamlet unk met her future husband fellow actor Adam unk son of Love unk unk star Jack unk </s>
<s> They met again two years later during a production of Twelfth Night and went on to become a couple </s>
<s> The pair married in May and unk gave birth to their first daughter in July that year </s>
<s> Their second daughter was born in January </s>
